story:
Short Summary

My name is Chidera Ubah, and I am the author of Chasing Passion. I wrote this book because I felt like there are certain perspectives missing from the advice and stories people give when you ask them what to do about “finding your passion”, and I wanted this book to address a couple of those perspectives. My book details the journey of a Nigerian English teacher by the name of Adanna Ikeji, who is fulfilling her desire to find something she is passionate about that will inspire her to do something ambitious and leave an interesting legacy.My hope is that, in reading this book, you’ll realize that that the idea of passion, or living a passion-filled lifestyle doesn’t look the same for everybody, and it shouldn’t have to. Just because your passion doesn’t mirror someone else’s, or your experiences don’t match, doesn’t mean that you lack passion. It just means that it manifests in your life differently.  As long as it makes sense to you, then that’s all that counts!

In this book, you’ll get to explore different themes that concern:

  • Passion & Fame/Accolades: People believe that if you’re truly passionate about something, your enthusiasm for it should be able to translate to views, clicks, likes, retweets, etc. This causes some people think that if they can’t get attention or recognition for what they do, their passion is invalid.
  • Passion & Legacy: Most of us would like to be remembered for something special or noteworthy; we don’t just want to be another passing face among everyone else. But should we be more concerned about creating a legacy for the world, or being a kind and memorable person to those who know us intimately?
  • The Nature of Passion: When people hear passion, they’re likely to first think of a single career or hobby. However, people can be passionate about a quality or trait (like being kind, reliable, trustworthy, understanding, etc.), people can be passionate about a role they play (being a good sister, being a good friend, being a good mother, etc.), or people can be passionate about multiple things, choose their career based off one thing, and do the rest on the side, or blend them in with their career (i.e. a doctor who is passionate about writing can be a medical journalist).

What We Need & What You Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December, 2019
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this winter

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish

  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

The Impact

I have studied Biological Sciences and a Minor in Public Health at Wayne State University, and have participated in a series of unique extracurriculars that reflect my interest and passion for experiencing all the opportunities that life has to offer. I wrote this book somewhat as a self-reflection of my journey in trying to define passion in a way that made sense for me, and not trying to box myself into the vision of passion that society has framed for itself. I want people to know that their passion doesn’t have to look or function a specific way in order for it to be valid, a realization that took me some time to make.
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #ChasingPassionBook and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
  • Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Chidera Ubah

story:
Phil Needs Your Support!

Some people don't like to read and prefer the quick and dirty...here it goes:
  • I'm raising money to visit prisons and spread God's word 
  • The cost is $900 and this gets me into a lot of prisons
  • Softball is the vehicle we use to get the attention of thousands of inmates
  • Thank you and God Bless

Why Help?

Lets talk about why we are here. First, I'd like to thank you deeply for visiting this page. I truly appreciate your support. Your support certainly does not have to be in the form of money, the most powerful thing you can do is pray. 

Please pray for myself and the men of the Deacons Softball Team, that we will be led by God and given the strength and confidence we need to stand in front of many spreading His Word. Pray that God will give us the words to speak and help spread the good news of His Son Jesus Christ. The prisoners that we will be visiting may have lost hope, but we have the message that can change their lives. Please also pray that God will soften their hearts and open their eyes so that the blind may see.

Softball is just the tip of the spear, it just gets us through the gates. Once we are in the real work begins...

What is the Deacons Prison Ministry?

The Deacons' Prison Ministry is about winning souls for Jesus. For the last 14 years we have been using softball as a tool to enter into prisons to minister the good news of Jesus, the one true Son of God. We enter into these prisons with one goal in mind - sharing this gospel. Jesus commanded us to go throughout the world and make disciples of men. Sometime during each of the softball games, one player will give their personal testimony and another will give the inmates the option to receive Christ as his personal savior that very day. Our team has ministered to many state and federal correctional institutions for the last 14 years.
"And He said to them, 'Go into all the world and preach the gospel to every creature.' ” Mark 16:15 NKJV

Hard Work and Sacrifice Combined with Prayer = Saved Lives.

Last year, from April - October, we played 25 games, ministered to over 2,400 inmates and had 259 first-time decisions for Christ. Every time we enter these state and federal institutions, the inmates are glad to see us. They are always surprised that we would travel such a distance just to minister to them.

The opportunity we’re trying to give these inmates is a spiritual second chance, no matter how long their internment.

For more info:

Please visit http://deaconsprisonministry.org/index.html 
to learn more about the Deacons Prison Ministry.

story:
Hi there! My name is Dey Dos and I'm a freelancer in the whole sense of the word. I freely choose to engage in a diverse set of very exciting projects, and when my part is done I always move on to the next big thing that will keep me creating and most importantly: HAPPY! - You can find more about me in my website.

I will define my current life style as eternal and awesome holidays, of the type worth remembering! I do what I love to do (from facilitating and public speaking to coaching and brand design), I constantly travel to exciting destinations and, in each one of these places, I meet new people with whom I share my discoveries and from whom I learn new perspectives about life. And that's exactly what I want to bring to you with this book: a simple - yet powerful - way to design a life style that makes you happy and keeps you excited!

More than a book, I want it to be a guide; not with instructions, but full of exercises. A book not only to read but to write in, like a journal! I envision the book with spaces for you to write your discoveries, to track your progress and to map your new path! A guide for you to experiment a set of different proposals I'm drafting based on my experiences; a lot of stories that I have compiled from my trips to 76 countries and my 10 years of experience as a Life Coach. All in all, I want the book to be a companion for you in your quest to design the life style that matches that of your dreams!  

 

The book is written in 10 simple chapters, each of them making reference to a key learning point of my journey:

  1. Big Changes Start From Within
  2. Stop Asking “Who Am I?”
  3. Choose To Believe
  4. Don’t Give A Damn!
  5. Company Matters, A Lot!
  6. There Is No Other Moment
  7. Just Say “YES” To Something
  8. Do What You Say You’re Going To Do
  9. Happy Endings Are Real
  10. Trust That Life Is Wise
Some of them may be a bit controversial as single statements, and well, I'm a bit controversial myself! However, the deep exploration of these key sentences have taken me to a place of peace and harmony, and that's what I truly want to share with you in my book.
 
The book will definitely make you think a lot, that's for sure! Sometimes it will make you smile and agree. Sometimes it will make you go all pissed off about something you are not sure about what it is. Boring is the only thing I'm certain that this book will never be! The core idea is to push you out of your comfort zone, and from there, support you find a way to design your own path. I have been doing this for years in seminars, conferences, webinars, etc. and the time has come to put it in paper and stop pushing my work under the radar to remain anonymous. As you can see, writing and publishing this book is also part of my own process of life design.

I just want to have the freedom to fully dedicate my next two months to finish the book without having to worry financially and then defocusing by engaging in other revenue generating activities. I also want my travels within the next two months to be fully dedicated to gather more stories to make the book better without having to worry about anything else.

I've been working on this book for quite a while and have the complete draft ready. Now I want to dedicate myself to compile the exercises within the different chapters and add the stories that give personality to each one of them. The idea is to have the book ready for self-publishing by the end of September; so, if you support me with any of the perks that includes a signed book, you'll receive your copies by the end of October 2012!

Your support to this campaign will give me the freedom I need to enter into my "popcorn creation mood" and get the book finished. And I have to say that this is all I dream about for the past month or so!

If you can't contribute money, I understand (believe me!) Or if you prefer to wait for the release of the book to buy it, I understand that as well!

The book will be available to be purchased online only, and the shipping costs plus my hand written personalized dedication truly make it a better deal to pre-buy it here - I had to say it!

Please notice that no matter what you contribution is, your name will be listed in a special acknowledgments page of the book! Also notice that all perks that involve copies of the book include shipping from Portugal to anywhere in the world using express not trackable shipment. I'll start shipping the books in October, so depending on where you are you will be receiving yours latest by the end of November 2012.  

So, why should YOU support this campaign? Simple: Because - as I mention it earlier -  it will be cheaper for you; because your book will arrive with a personal dedication handwritten from me; and because in that way you will make sure that I can completely focus the next two months to finish something totally awesome for YOU!

There are other ways in which you can also help me out:

  • Like the page of the book in Facebook and contribute as much as you can in the co-creation of the content by answering the questions I will be posting and by sharing your stories.
  • If you have any type of questions, please post them in the comments section of this campaign in the top tabs or in the timeline of the Facebook page of the book. I'll answer them as fast as I can, my promise!
  • Let your friends and colleagues know about this campaign so that they contribute as well. You can use the share tools in this page to help me spread the word, I'll appreciate that a lot!

As I said before, this book is also part of my journey and your support means a lot to me! And that’s all there is to it.

Thanks zillions for your support!

Love tons,

Dey

story:
"This is either genius masquerading as psychosis or the other way around- And as to which, Ganje has blissfully left it to the reader to decide."- Eldon Thompson, Author of "The Legend of Asahiel" and "Warder" trilogies. 

 

(An unnecessarily wordy summary)

Well hello there. If by some magical stroke of luck you've arrived here, you're probably wondering a very simple and biblical question: "Who the hell are you?" Well. That one's easy enough, even though I must admit I don't like your tone. I'm Luke Ganje and I like to tell stories. Very specific stories, in this case. Horrible stories. The kinds of stories you probably wouldn't want to read aloud in the presence of priests, rabbits (not a typo, they're finicky), or your dear Aunt Ida who is prone to bouts of prayer and dementia. 

This is a collection of 11 episodes of the absurd. From answering the question we always wanted to know "If Air Bud were real, all the balls to the face would have catastrophic health consequences... right?" to a fine dissection of why it's a terrible idea to take your sociopathic son on a hunting trip, this anthology (we actually prefer "almost-novel", it makes us sound sexier) has it all. There's profanity (a lot. We counted), violence (trust us on that one, but the severed limbs are tastefully done), absurdity (I mean...naturally), and a cast of miscreants so repellent that they will routinely cause you to wonder "How in the Hell could this possibly be a good idea?"

The truth is, we don't know. We have absolutely no clue.

But it seemed like a good idea at the time.

 

JOIN THE PREORDER! 

In this, my first foray into self-publication, we're seeking funding to get this book released unto the masses (not unlike a hoard of locusts) through pre-orders to streamline the whole process with a can-do spirit. What this will be is a revolutionary (narrator: he clearly doesn't know what that word means) way of publishing wherein I'll either ship you signed copies or you can collect them at a release party that is sure to be the event of the century. 

Get the book signed! Get some swag! Get one of the rare Advanced Readers Copies! Pay a little more and find a version of yourself in the next absurd story! (About that last one: Tread carefully. It's a one-track road to seeing yourself put through a literal gauntlet of the ridiculously macabre). 

In short, support this venture. Support a stark raving lunatic and his cast of unforgettable monsters. And maybe, just maybe, you'll laugh. 

Either that or you'll burn the thing in a demonstration sometime in August, but at that point I'll already have your money. 

I win.

Either that or you'll burn the thing in a demonstration sometime in August, but at that point I'll already have your money. 
I win.

story:
Tim Independen Kampanye PUTIH Jokowi-JK

Maraknya kampanye hitam terhadap Jokowi-JK menjadi pencetus lahirnya tim independen ini. Kami berkomitmen untuk menyuarakan kampanye putih bagi Jokowi-JK. Kampanye yang bersih, bertanggungjawab dan tidak menyerang pihak manapun. (Karena kami ANTI Kampanye Hitam).

Bagaimana caranya?

Melalui penerbitan TABLOID singkat, yang menampilkan keunggulan program pasangan Jokowi-JK & menampik berita-berita yang tidak benar (kampanye hitam). Tabloid ini akan disebar ke daerah-daerah yang selama ini gencar diserang kampanye hitam, sehingga warga tidak mengenal siapa sosok Jokowi-JK yang sesungguhnya.

Setiap warga bebas untuk memilih. Tapi seberapa bebaskah kebebasannya itu? Kebebasan yang dipagari oleh hasutan? Kebebasan yang dirantai oleh prasangka yang dipaksakan?

Seberapa bebas warga di pelosok daerah mengenal sosok Jokowi-JK yang SESUNGGUHNYA? 

Bukankah kampanye HITAM telah menjadikan sosok Jokowi-JK tidak lebih dari sekedar ROLL-FILM? Yang semuanya hanyalah tampak HITAM? 

Padahal sosok Jokowi-JK penuh dengan KEINDAHAN. Keindahan yang hanya akan tersingkap jika roll-film tersebut dicetak menjadi sebuah FOTO.

Inilah Kampanye PUTIH Kami!


Dukunglah penerbitan TABLOID kami!


Apa yang bisa Anda lakukan?

Dukunglah KAMPANYE PUTIH ini dengan mengirimkan sumbangan dana ke:

  1. Mandiri 900-00-1714876-9 a/n Johannes Ardiant Harlie
  2. Melalui platform Indiegogo ini. (Bagi Anda yang berada di luar negeri atau pengguna Credit Card).
  3. Melalui PayPal ke JOHANNES_ARDIANT at HKS15 dot HARVARD dot EDU

Dana akan dipakai untuk menutup biaya percetakan dan distribusi. Sisanya akan diserahkan kepada tim sukses resmi Jokowi-JK.

Kami akan mencetak & mendistribusikan tabloid sebanyak 200.000 eksemplar.

Dana yang dibutuhkan sebesar Rp. 100.000.000,- atau 10,000 USD.

Transparansi

Setelah transfer, harap SMS Danny 0821.22.1837.22. Cantumkan nama lengkap, jumlah nominal, bank tujuan dan alamat email Anda. Kami akan mengirimkan Laporan Keuangan, sebagai bentuk TRANSPARANSI perincian pengeluaran dan pemasukan kami.


Tim independen ini diprakarsai oleh Johannes Ardiant Harlie

Profil: Johannes saat ini sedang menempuh pendidikan Public Policy di John F. Kennedy School of Government, Harvard University dengan dukungan beasiswa dari Lembaga Pengelola Dana Pendidikan (LPDP). Pada bulan Juli tahun ini, ia akan mewakili Indonesia di dalam G20 Youth Summit 2014 di Sydney, Australia. Sebelumnya, ia bekerja di sebuah perusahaan konsultan di Jakarta, menyiapkan rekomendasi strategi infrastruktur untuk pemerintah Indonesia. Johannes juga pernah bekerja sebagai konsultan manajemen untuk beberapa klien di Malaysia dan Singapura. Johannes meraih gelar sarjana teknik komputer dari National University of Singapore. Johannes juga pernah menulis dua artikel yang ditampilkan di harian The Jakarta Post, yang berjudul: “Is Jokowi the will of history?” dan “Should big-bang decentralization continue?”

Berikut link artikelnya:

http://m.thejakartapost.com/news/2014/02/26/insight-is-jokowi-will-history.html

https://blogs.law.harvard.edu/joardiant/2014/03/10/should-big-bang-decentralization-continue/

http://www.pressdisplay.com/pressdisplay/viewer.aspx



Orang-orang di balik Kampanye PUTIH

Johannes Ardiant Harlie. Johannes saat ini sedang menempuh pendidikan di John F. Kennedy School of Government, Harvard University dengan dukungan beasiswa dari Lembaga Pengelola Dana Pendidikan (LPDP). Pada bulan Juli tahun ini, ia akan mewakili Indonesia di dalam G20 Youth Summit 2014 di Sydney, Australia. Sebelumnya, ia bekerja di sebuah perusahaan konsultan di Jakarta, menyiapkan rekomendasi strategi infrastruktur untuk pemerintah Indonesia. Johannes juga pernah bekerja sebagai konsultan manajemen untuk beberapa klien di Malaysia dan Singapura. Johannes meraih gelar sarjana teknik komputer dari National University of Singapore. Mengapa saya memilih Jokowi-JK? Indonesia perlu pemimpin yang mengerti masalah di lapangan dan bisa menyelesaikannya. Approach bottom-up yang perlu, bukan lagi top-down. Jokowi-JK dengan jelas menuangkan ini di dalam program-program mereka. Selain itu, Jokowi-JK punya rekam jejak yang jelas, prestasi mereka tidak dapat dipertanyakan lagi. Terakhir, orang-orang di belakang Jokowi-JK adalah juga orang-orang yang tidak memiliki hubungan dengan incumben regime, ini penting sekali untuk pemberantasan korupsi. Oleh karena itu, saya ingin bergabung dengan Ibu Khofifah Indar Parawansa, Pak Anies Baswedan, dan Pak Dahlan Iskan untuk mendukung Jokowi-JK sebagai pemimpin Indonesia berikutnya.

Ainun Najib. Ainun Najib saat ini bekerja sebagai Senior Consultant di salah satu perusahaan teknologi informasi terbesar dunia. Sebelumnya, ia menempuh pendidikan di Nanyang Technological University di dalam bidang teknik komputer. Putra asli Gresik, Jawa Timur ini sudah menikah dan telah dikaruniai dua orang anak. Mengapa saya memilih Jokowi-JK? Karena JOKOWI capres yang PALING ISLAMI. SATU, ia tidak mengejar-mengejar jabatan Presiden. Dia DIMINTA tidak MEMINTA. Selama hampir 10 tahun terakhir dia selalu fokus dengan tugasnya dan sukses menjalankan dengan baik: Walikota Solo 2005-2010, 2010 terpilih lagi dengan suara 90% rakyat! 2012 DIMINTA maju membenahi Jakarta, sukses! 2014 DIMINTA maju membenahi Indonesia, ayo kita sukseskan! Rasulullah bersabda: posisi/jabatan itu bukanlah untuk orang yang memintanya. DUA, ia lahir dari rahim umat Islam. Ibunya muslimah taat, mendidiknya dengan prinsip-prinsip Islam: Kejujuran, Kesederhanaan, Kedermawanan, Kecintaan pada kaum lemah (kebiasaannya sejak dulu di Solo selalu sedia beberapa karung beras 5kg di bagasi mobil, selalu siap jika bertemu yang membutuhkan; gajinya selalu dimasukkan amplop khusus, setiap ada warga yang datang mengadu kebutuhan hidupnya, dengan mudah dia ambilkan dari amplop ini kapan saja). Dia pun sangat menyayangi dan menghormati ibunya, sikap KAKUnya di KPU karena GERAM dengan FITNAH ke atas IBUNYA TERCINTA! TIGA, ia berakhlak SABAR, tidak pernah marah, dihujat difitnah seperti apapun hingga puncak ""kemarahan""nya pun sekedar tampil KAKU di KPU. Rasulullah SAW bersabda: Jangan Marah, bagimu Surga. Imam Harits al-Muhasibi berkata: intisari akhlak Islam adalah tidak marah. Andaikan IMAN itu tubuh badan, maka SABAR adalah kepalanya; IMAN tanpa SABAR laksana mayat tak berkepala. EMPAT, ia MEMANUSIAKAN MANUSIA. Esensi kulminasi dari ajaran Islam dalam ranah horisontal HABLUM MINAN NAAS. Memberikan perhatian dan mendengarkan dengan seksama setiap orang yang mendekatinya. Tidak pernah melihat dirinya lebih tinggi lebih berhak dari yang lain: mempersilahkan orang lain duduk di tempatnya, selalu menolak ketika dipersilahkan maju ke shaf paling depan ketika sholat jama'ah - biasa saja dia sholat di shaf belakang. Menyelesaikan masalah-masalah sosial dengan pendekatan manusiawi, seperti hendak memindahkan pasar di Solo pun dia dekati para pedagang pasarnya sebagai teman bicara hingga 51 kali (LIMA PULUH SATU KALI!) makan siang bersama! LIMA, ia tidak berkompromi demi kekuasaan, dengan tegas menolak permintaan bagi-bagi kursi menteri, hingga partai-partai yang terkenal selalu minta jatah, bahkan juga yang biasanya minta hitam-di-atas-putih atas jumlah menteri, semua mental dia TOLAK. Tidak semata karena bernafsu ingin jadi Presiden lantas jual-beli tawaran koalisi dihalalkan begitu saja. Bukankah INI ESENSI KEPEMIMPINAN ISLAMI?

Eva Andreanty. Eva Andreanty adalah ibu dari seorang putra dan seorang putri, dan saat ini bekerja pada perusahaan real time financial information, TELEQUOTE, sesuai dengan latar belakang pendidikan saya di Information Technology. Di TELEQUOTE, Eva dipercaya sebagai Regional Manager untuk wilayah Indonesia. Mengapa saya memilih Jokowi-JK? Jokowi dan Jusuf Kalla mencerminkan pribadi yang sederhana, yang jelas hasil kerjanya dan jelas kemampuannya. Mereka tidak asal janji tetapi mereka sudah membuktikannya dari pengalaman mereka selama ini. Jokowi, Jusuf Kalla, serta orang-orang yang berada di belakangnya adalah orang-orang bersih tanpa "cacat" dalam catatan sejarah Indonesia. Pendek kata saya akan mendukung dan memilih Jokowi dan Jusuf Kalla untuk memimpin Republik Indonesia ini menjadi negara yang maju.

Elina Ciptadi. Elina Ciptadi adalah communication consultant independen, yang sebelumnya bekerja di Indo Pacific (sekarang Edelman Indonesia). Elina dan timnya mendirikan media center Mahkamah Konstitusi ketika baru berdiri tahun 2003/2004. Elina juga terlibat mendirikan media center pemerintah Indonesia setelah Bom Bali pertama dan tsunami Aceh/Nias, lalu menjadi account director media center pemerintah Indonesia di United Nations Climate Change Conference (UNFCCC) di Bali tahun 2007. Ia lebih dikenal sebagai corporate communication consultant yang mengembalikan kepercayaan masyarakat terhadap klien dalam situasi krisis: ketika perusahaan jadi korban smear campaign, harus product recall, dan sebagainya. Elina mendapatkan gelar MBA dari University of Western Australia dan Bachelor of Communication dari Bond University. Mengapa saya memilih Jokowi-JK? Sejujurnya, siapa yang jadi presiden tidak berpengaruh banyak buat saya karena suami saya bukan WNI dan anak saya memiliki dual citizenship. Tapi saya ingin Indonesia dipimpin orang baik yg membanggakan, dan anak saya bangga jadi WNI. Saya tidak berpartai dan beberapa kali golput karena hasilnya sama saja: pemerintah tetap bobrok. Tapi saya melihat perubahan di Jakarta ketika Jokowi-Ahok terpilih. Saya lihat PLN jadi jauh lebih baik di tangan Dahlan Iskan. Saya pernah bertemu Anies Baswedan dan terkesan dengan visinya untuk pendidikan Indonesia dan komitmennya untuk turun tangan walaupun dia hidupnya sudah nyaman. Saya sangat hortmat dengan Todung Mulya Lubis, satu dari sedikit sekali pengacara top Indonesia yang masih punya integritas dan tidak mau menjual diri membela klien yang jelas-jelas salah tapi berani bayar mahal. Semua orang ini berdiri di belakang Jokowi.

Yanadi Sutan Gading. Sutan adalah manusia yang penuh dengan kelemahan dan banyak dianugerahi dengan kesempatan dididik sebagai Sarjana Teknik di Universitas Nasional Singapura dan dipekerjakan sebagai Insinyur Aplikasi & Serpis di perusahaan jasa tambang minyak FMC Technologies. Ia menolak dicap sebagai Chauvinis ataupun Anti-patriotis, tetapi memiliki semangat untuk melihat orang-orang Indonesia memiliki kualitas hidup dan pendidikan yang lebih baik supaya memiliki kemampuan untuk menentukan jalan hidup sendiri dengan penuh tanggung jawab. Ia mengharapkan kalau suatu hari orang-orang Indonesia bisa mengakui, menghargai, dan menerima perbedaan; untuk setuju untuk tidak setuju dan tetap saling menyayangi. Mengapa saya memilih Jokowi-JK? Berbeda dari Batman di film The Dark Knight, "Beliau lah pahlawan yang Indonesia pantas dapatkan, dan yang Indonesia butuhkan sekarang." Jokowi adalah seseorang yang merepresentasikan harapan. Ini pertama kali saya melihat sendiri masyarakat Indonesia memiliki harapan yang sebesar ini terhadap seseorang yang diharapkan akan sanggup membawa orang-orang Indonesia memiliki kehidupan yang lebih baik. Tentunya harapan masyarakat didasarkan pada rekam jejak JKW dan JK yang sudah membuktikan diri mereka bukanlah hanya berbicara saja, melainkan melakukan apa yang mereka bicarakan dengan penuh tanggung jawab. Bahkan sering kali, tanpa banyak berbicara pun banyak masalah sudah diselesaikan oleh mereka. Inilah saatnya salah satu putera terbaik Indonesia memimpin bangsa dan didukung oleh orang-orang terbaik Indonesia. Stop status quo!

I Ketut Adi Putra. I Ketut Adi Putra, atau yang biasa dikenal dengan nama Adi, adalah seorang pemuda keturunan Bali yang kini bekerja sebagai seorang profesional di sebuah bank investasi global berbasis di Jakarta. Ia mengenyam pendidikan akuntansi dan keuangan di Universitas Indonesia dan lulus dengan nilai terbaik di angkatannya. Beberapa pencapaian yang pernah diraih antara lain mewakili Indonesia sebagai Menteri Keuangan Muda dalam G20 Youth Summit dan penghargaan Global Leader Award oleh Goldman Sachs Foundation. Di sela-sela waktu kerjanya, aktif sebagai fasilitator kepemimpinan pemuda lewat Young Leaders for Indonesia by McKinsey & Company serta youth think-tank Indonesian Youth Diplomacy. Mengapa saya memilih Jokowi-JK? Keduanya melambangkan keseimbangan antara tua-muda, pemikir-pekerja, pebisnis-birokrat, Indonesia Timur-Barat. Terlebih lagi, saya percaya mereka jujur, terpercaya, memiliki track record bersih, pluralis, dan cinta Indonesia.

Sonni. Sonni adalah alumni Universitas Bina Nusantara Jakarta, mengambil jurusan manajemen dan ekonomi. Saat ini ia adalah seorang wiraswasta. Mengapa saya memilih Jokowi-JK? Pertama, karena mereka sudah teruji prestasinya di mata ibukota maupun di mata dunia. Kedua, karena Indonesia butuh figur orang yang jujur serta merakyat. Ketiga, karena Indonesia butuh perbaikan sistem di segala aspek yang tidak berpihak pada kepentingan sekelompok orang berkuasa.

Elina juga terlibat mendirikan media center pemerintah Indonesia setelah Bom Bali pertama dan tsunami Aceh/Nias, lalu menjadi account director media center pemerintah Indonesia di United Nations Climate Change Conference (UNFCCC) di Bali tahun 2007. Ia lebih dikenal sebagai corporate communication consultant yang mengembalikan kepercayaan masyarakat terhadap klien dalam situasi krisis: ketika perusahaan jadi korban smear campaign, harus product recall, dan sebagainya. Elina mendapatkan gelar MBA dari University of Western Australia dan Bachelor of Communication dari Bond University. Mengapa saya memilih Jokowi-JK? Sejujurnya, siapa yang jadi presiden tidak berpengaruh banyak buat saya karena suami saya bukan WNI dan anak saya memiliki dual citizenship. Tapi saya ingin Indonesia dipimpin orang baik yg membanggakan, dan anak saya bangga jadi WNI. Saya tidak berpartai dan beberapa kali golput karena hasilnya sama saja: pemerintah tetap bobrok. Tapi saya melihat perubahan di Jakarta ketika Jokowi-Ahok terpilih. Saya lihat PLN jadi jauh lebih baik di tangan Dahlan Iskan. Saya pernah bertemu Anies Baswedan dan terkesan dengan visinya untuk pendidikan Indonesia dan komitmennya untuk turun tangan walaupun dia hidupnya sudah nyaman. Saya sangat hortmat dengan Todung Mulya Lubis, satu dari sedikit sekali pengacara top Indonesia yang masih punya integritas dan tidak mau menjual diri membela klien yang jelas-jelas salah tapi berani bayar mahal. Semua orang ini berdiri di belakang Jokowi.Yanadi Sutan Gading. Sutan adalah manusia yang penuh dengan kelemahan dan banyak dianugerahi dengan kesempatan dididik sebagai Sarjana Teknik di Universitas Nasional Singapura dan dipekerjakan sebagai Insinyur Aplikasi & Serpis di perusahaan jasa tambang minyak FMC Technologies. Ia menolak dicap sebagai Chauvinis ataupun Anti-patriotis, tetapi memiliki semangat untuk melihat orang-orang Indonesia memiliki kualitas hidup dan pendidikan yang lebih baik supaya memiliki kemampuan untuk menentukan jalan hidup sendiri dengan penuh tanggung jawab. Ia mengharapkan kalau suatu hari orang-orang Indonesia bisa mengakui, menghargai, dan menerima perbedaan; untuk setuju untuk tidak setuju dan tetap saling menyayangi. Mengapa saya memilih Jokowi-JK? Berbeda dari Batman di film The Dark Knight, "Beliau lah pahlawan yang Indonesia pantas dapatkan, dan yang Indonesia butuhkan sekarang." Jokowi adalah seseorang yang merepresentasikan harapan. Ini pertama kali saya melihat sendiri masyarakat Indonesia memiliki harapan yang sebesar ini terhadap seseorang yang diharapkan akan sanggup membawa orang-orang Indonesia memiliki kehidupan yang lebih baik. Tentunya harapan masyarakat didasarkan pada rekam jejak JKW dan JK yang sudah membuktikan diri mereka bukanlah hanya berbicara saja, melainkan melakukan apa yang mereka bicarakan dengan penuh tanggung jawab. Bahkan sering kali, tanpa banyak berbicara pun banyak masalah sudah diselesaikan oleh mereka. Inilah saatnya salah satu putera terbaik Indonesia memimpin bangsa dan didukung oleh orang-orang terbaik Indonesia. Stop status quo!I Ketut Adi Putra. I Ketut Adi Putra, atau yang biasa dikenal dengan nama Adi, adalah seorang pemuda keturunan Bali yang kini bekerja sebagai seorang profesional di sebuah bank investasi global berbasis di Jakarta. Ia mengenyam pendidikan akuntansi dan keuangan di Universitas Indonesia dan lulus dengan nilai terbaik di angkatannya. Beberapa pencapaian yang pernah diraih antara lain mewakili Indonesia sebagai Menteri Keuangan Muda dalam G20 Youth Summit dan penghargaan Global Leader Award oleh Goldman Sachs Foundation. Di sela-sela waktu kerjanya, aktif sebagai fasilitator kepemimpinan pemuda lewat Young Leaders for Indonesia by McKinsey & Company serta youth think-tank Indonesian Youth Diplomacy. Mengapa saya memilih Jokowi-JK? Keduanya melambangkan keseimbangan antara tua-muda, pemikir-pekerja, pebisnis-birokrat, Indonesia Timur-Barat. Terlebih lagi, saya percaya mereka jujur, terpercaya, memiliki track record bersih, pluralis, dan cinta Indonesia.Sonni. Sonni adalah alumni Universitas Bina Nusantara Jakarta, mengambil jurusan manajemen dan ekonomi. Saat ini ia adalah seorang wiraswasta. Mengapa saya memilih Jokowi-JK? Pertama, karena mereka sudah teruji prestasinya di mata ibukota maupun di mata dunia. Kedua, karena Indonesia butuh figur orang yang jujur serta merakyat. Ketiga, karena Indonesia butuh perbaikan sistem di segala aspek yang tidak berpihak pada kepentingan sekelompok orang berkuasa.

story:
The Out of the Dark Anthology of stories is collected from authors from around the world. It endeavours to show the horror that is truly deep space and explore everything we don't know about the space between the galaxies.

The book will be published by Altair Australia Pty Ltd under the editorial guidance of Robert N Stephenson. Authors who contribute to the collection are being paid the day of story acceptance and their payments are not part of this funding support call. All authors are being paid by Robert N Stephenson directly.

The small amount set is what it is believed the production costs will be for the print and e-book files. The print book will be sold at cost to buyers and the e-book given away free or sold at the lowest possible price allowed by distributors. While Altair Australia Pty Ltd is the holding company, it has a publishing imprint, Altair Australia Books, and it is making no profit from this production.

Reason for the low costs for sale is because these new and not so new voices in Science Fiction and Horror Writing do need easy exposure and promotion amongst the clutter and deluge of materials flooding books shelves (real and virtual) of late. The best way to let people see what is out there is to introduce them to the writers. The writer is paid for the use of their story, and hopefully they are paid in readers as they discover what they have to offer now and in the future.

While Robert N Stephenson is covering all author payments, all artwork and as much in-house design as possible it does require a modest sum to cover the outside expenses of copy editing and design.

The address for the fiction call is   http://www.ralan.com/listings/hosted/fromoutdark.htm

The release of this book is slated for Christmas 2014, so a interesting gift for that special reader would be great, not only for the reader but for the authors of these works.

The cover has already been purchased and is also not reliant on this funding call. The cover has been painted by Bob Eggleton and is used with permission.

Thank you for your time, consideration and possible donation. If a donation cannot be made please do consider writing for the collection, or perhaps ordering a copy once it become available.

story:
Story of My Book

 

My name is Brian Ely, and I am the author of The Passionate Professional: Finding Fulfillment through a Work-Life Balance. This book is about building balance between a passion and a career. Leveraging this balance in meaningful ways can merge these spheres into a union that is more fulfilling than the sum of its parts: work-life balance. 

I wrote this book because of an overwhelming sense of imbalance I encountered during my first two years at college. Academics and professional development had pushed almost everything else I had loved and pursued out of my life. 

This didn’t sit right. 

So I set out to to bring back not only my passions, but pieces of my own identity. In short, I strove to regain balance. My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover how to pursue a similar balance between your own passions and career. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for building a work-life symmetry. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you find greater fulfillment and satisfaction from both the creative and material sides of your life. 

In this book, you'll learn about building work-life balance as well as its practical and meaningful applications. You'll hear stories such as...

How Eman Rahman, a Georgetown alum, was able to land a career on Wall Street while majoring in English. 

How Eric Anslyn, a chemistry professor at the University of Texas Austin, maintains his childhood hobby of building and racing go-karts while simultaneously pursuing a decorated career in supramolecular chemistry. 

How David Solomon, the CEO of Goldman Sachs, spins records and produces his own electronic music in his spare time. 

You will love this book if you feel that one or more area of your life are unbalanced; if you seek new ways to find fulfillment from your endeavors; or if you strive to explore new dimensions of success. 

The Passionate Professional is a nonfiction book that speaks to landed professionals and college students who want to look at work-life balance and personal fulfillment in a new way.

 

The Book - The Passionate Professional

 

The book is written in three parts...


Part One contains the Introduction and Chapters One and Two. In this section, I introduce the concept of work-life balance. I discuss how in many instances, success is regarded as a one-dimensional concept when now, more than ever, individuals should be cognizant of not just their careers, but their passions and their hobbies. With these ideas serving as a foundation for the rest of the book, I then showcase a handful of stories from landed professionals such as Warren Buffett, who have found ways to pursue effective work-life balances in their own lives. 

Part Two contains Chapters Three-Five. I delve deeper into the work-life balance, exploring how to engage passion and productivity simultaneously, whether it’s in a career or in college academics. Additionally, I address the question of specialization, and how to refine the work-life balance without leaving it devoid of passion and creativity.  

Part Three contains Chapters Six-Eight, as well as my Closing Thoughts. These chapters take the idea of work-life balance and apply it to larger concepts such as student start-ups and company culture. Additionally, I discuss how the college admissions process can lay an ideal foundation for a successful work-life balance. That said, it remains a powerful philosophy that can accompany an individual throughout his or her life. 

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

 

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April, 2021.
  • The Cover Design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The Copy Editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book when I ultimately publish in April 2021.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.*

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And more!

*The cost of shipping in the United States is included in the cost of your purchases. Note that international shipping is an additional cost that will be added at check-out.

 

About the Author

 

Brian Ely is currently a junior at Georgetown University, majoring in government and minoring in journalism and history. He has professional experience in the journalism industry as well as in the U.S. Senate. After graduating, Brian plans to attend law school, with the goal of practicing corporate law. 

Through the lens of fresh and relatable experiences in the critical transition phase between college and a career, Brian hopes to share insight into building a more meaningful definition of success through the concept of work-life balance. 

Outside of writing and academics, Brian enjoys playing violin, traveling, and spending time with his family in Fairbanks, Alaska.

For more information, you can connect with Brian at bae45@georgetown.edu, on LinkedIn (Brian Ely), Facebook (Brian Ely), and Instagram (@brian.a.ely).
 

Risks and Challenges

 

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. 

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #thepassionateprofessional and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Brian Ely

story:
Bref résumé

Le réseau écosocialiste lutte pour un nouveau projet politique réalisant la synthèse d'une écologie anticapitaliste et d'un socialisme débarrassé de la logique productiviste.

Vos dons et votre adhésion serviront à:
  • organiser des formations et des ateliers sur l’écosocialisme;
  • lancer une revue annuelle écosocialiste;
  • publier une brochure présentant des analyses et des perspectives sur l’incompatibilité du capitalisme avec l’écologie;
  • organiser les instances du réseau.

Au sujet du Réseau

L’écosocialisme est un nouveau projet politique réalisant la synthèse d’une écologie anticapitaliste et d’un socialisme débarrassé des logiques du productivisme. C’est la réponse humaine raisonnée à la double impasse dans laquelle est enfermée dorénavant l’humanité en raison du mode de production actuel qui épuise l’être humain et la nature. C’est un projet de société alternatif au capitalisme qui exige de repenser non seulement la propriété du système de production et d’échange, mais aussi le contenu des productions et les modes de consommation.

L’écosocialisme rejette le modèle de croissance infinie imposé par le capitalisme et défend la nécessaire réduction de certaines productions et de certaines consommations porteuses d’une empreinte écologique inacceptable. Nous sommes pour une reconversion économique qui préserve les intérêts des classes populaires dans une perspective de « transition juste ». Notre projet vise une économie gérée démocratiquement, au service des besoins sociaux, et qui rompt avec le consumérisme, la publicité et la marchandisation généralisée conduisant à des gaspillages destructeurs.

Le réseau  est à la fois  un centre  d’élaboration des perspectives écosocialistes, un espace d’animation de débats et de formations et un réseau de militant-e-s membres de Québec Solidaire.

story:
Handmade wooden book ends and toys created in my garage/workshop to promote the book.





The Boy Who Skated With Dragons is a fun and exciting story for kids with captivating illustrations, it teaches kids great lessons about life and doing great things despite obstacles.

My name is Jim Bates and I grew up in a small city in California called Newbury Park. I was a shy boy who eventually realized a passion for skateboarding and was able to build confidence in myself through skateboarding. I have written and illustrated a children's picture book to share hope with kids and to teach them that they have gifts and talents that can be used to do great things in life despite obstacles, it is possible to overcome obstacles in life and make an amazing impact on others doing the things that are enjoyable. I believe that dreams can come true and anything is possible if we keep working towards our goals. This is my dream and I am asking for help to bring it to life. This story is close to my heart and I feel it can be a great tool to bring joy to many kids and make a positive impact in various ways.

I am raising money with this page so that I can publish my book, share it with kids in all types of environments such as libraries, schools, parks, skate shops, book stores and anywhere else where kids can be reached. I want to make a difference in other people's lives using my gifts. Any contribution will go towards making this happen, you can be a part of this exciting project.


I need to raise $3,800 for printing costs, I am offering rewards in exchange for donations and a small fraction of this money goes to shipping and there is also a processing fee for indie go go and paypal. Some of the perks for your help include signed book marks, 1st edition signed copies of the book, t-shirts, artwork, handmade wooden toys, skateboard racks, book ends and personal appearances and readings.

If you can't donate, any support will be helpful such as telling friends and family or sharing on all types of social media. Thank you for checking out my project, it means a lot to me.

story:
Hey there guys!!! Thanks for expressing your interest. I genuinely appreciate it.

I've just about finished my book BOLD!, but my publisher requires that I purchase a large number of books before they will actually publish it and, I suppose quite obviously, I need partners in this venture.

Here's what Steve Forbes and Brian Tracy have to say about BOLD! 

"A how to get ahead book based on the author's real world experiences that is just what we need in these difficult times." 
~ STEVE FORBES, Chairman Forbes Media

"This powerful, practical book shows you a proven system to build an extraordinary life, accomplish all your goals and achieve more than you ever thought possible."
~ BRIAN TRACY, NY Times Bestselling Author of over 50 books

Do you want to be a part of something big and meaningful? A way to affect and assist the world, one person at a time?

Being a part of BOLD! The 6 Pillars of Success (however you define success, btw) will have a ripple effect, helping thousands of people further access and actualize their greater potential and purpose in life. 

In turn, these actualized lives will pay it forward, positively affecting tens to hundreds of thousands lives. 

Pretty cool, huh? One small contribution and the ripple effect can change thousands of lives for the better.

BOLD! is filled with the laws (the psychology, philosophy, beliefs and habits) that the world's most fulfillment and successful people live by.

These are the laws that have allowed me to radically re-invent myself or my career 5 times and succeed at high levels in wildly diverse professions. They are also the laws that every highly successful person I have interviewed or investigated lives by.

I left home at age 14, bound for a drug clinic, and spent the remainder of my youth bouncing between friends' families, benevolent empty-nesters, off and on with my mother and even lived in a tent for a while.

I own the dubious distinctions of taking 5 years to complete 4 years of high school, while graduating 326th from my high school class of... well, 326. Dead last. 

Yet I went on to appear in the #1 TV show in the world and in acclaimed plays.

I left acting at age thirty to go to college. I felt like a total loser having no education. (This is in no way a judgment of those who don't have a traditional education. It just describes how I felt.) 

I struggled at first, because I had no idea how to learn. But I ended up graduating from UCLA's top-10 program with honors and received my MBA from Purdue's top-20 business school.

I soon became a Fortune-25 Vice President. 12 years later I left corporate America and founded my first company, Billing Management Group. I sold BMG four years later. Now I write and speak on Peak Performance, Leadership & Success. (BTW, these 3 things are 80% synonymous. Successful people are peak performers and leaders--even if they only lead themselves on a daily basis and don't directly lead others. In turn, leaders must be successful peak performers or they won't be leading too many people.)

My book is about how we can crush the self-limitations 99% of people live a trapped life under and eventually die from. BOLD! guides you in how you can craft and master your potential; your one shot at life. How you can lead yourself (and others) to brilliant success and fulfillment.

Regardless of your investment decision, use the IndieGoGo Share tools and get the word out!!! Share with your community now and Make a Difference!

Go ahead and choose to INVEST WITH ME now and LET'S MAKE A MATERIAL DIFFERENCE in individuals' lives and in the world. 

Dream, be and act HUGE my friends
– for to do any less is to deny who you are.
And live with BOLD conviction – as you move
forcefully into the certainty of your great success!

And THANKS! for joining the community!

story:
Short Summary

Westminster Slam is an energetic community of writers that holds down open mics, weekly community writing workshops, and monthly poetry slams. In the past, we've presented at middle schools, high schools, and juvenile detention centers, and performed for Mondays in the Park, MLK Day celebrations, and community fundraisers. 

If you're interested in reading how Westminster Slam impacts its college community, follow this link: https://www.westminstercollege.edu/pdf/honors/HM_Fall13.pdf

What We Need & What You Get

Competing nationally at CUPSI may look like all fun and glory, but registration, lodging, and traveling expenses add up to over $1,200. 

What do you get out of helping Westminster Slam get to CUPSI?

Our Poetry! 

Any $5+ contribution will be repaid with a poem written especially for you by a member of our team!                                          

Features!

 Westminster Slam can feature at your event!

Out of state features! 

Remember how Aaron Samuels rocked the mic at the Battle at Botanica / performed and freestyle rapped for the Greenhouse Effect Open Mic in December? Remember how Rowie Shebala showed love to the SLC poetry slam community in November? We're able to host features thanks to cnnections we make at national competitions like CUPSI and contributions from patrons like you! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Drop by our monthly poetry slam at Magdalene's Religious Goods and Coffee Grotto (2030 S 900 E, SLC) on February 15th, 2014 at 8pm and enjoy the show. We'll sure you'll fall in love with at least one poem. :)

story:
Hi. Mirsky here. 

You might know me from McSweeney's Internet Tendency or Best American Essays or possibly because we went to elementary school together. Or maybe we're related?  

Anyway, here goes the pitch: 

I'm deep into the process of writing my first book - a memoir about Lev's 3 years as a magnificent little person and the first three years I lived with his ghost. I’m invited to study (through a Butler University MFA workshop) in France for 3 weeks in May-June with Ann Hood, an icon in the field of fiction and memoir. This is a once in a career opportunity. It’s not free. It’s not even cheap. It’s not even, like, reasonably priced. 

The tuition for the program itself is $2500. The airfare is about $1500. The cost of lodging is variable depending on where I stay, but I was told to conservatively budget $1000. Holy crap, guys. That's a bunch of money. 

This whole thing has come at me like a wall of water – pretty overwhelming and unexpectedly - and it’s all happening in 7 weeks. As such, there's not time to drastically contract my finances and live like a monk and save up (also, I have an 8 year old who would NOT tolerate such shenanigans).  It’s do or don’t.  If I am able to do this, I hope to come home from France with some serious page count on the memoir I’ve been chipping away at for 3-ish years. Or a real, tangible proposal to finally pitch said memoir to publishers. Or several essays. Maybe all of it? I promise, though, I’ll write my heart out. I always do. 

Just now - at age almost-40 - admitting that writing is all I’m really qualified to do, that it's what I love/hate most and what I'm all about along with the experience of beginning to write professionally and meeting people in the basically antique secret society of book publishing has rendered me equal parts humble, grateful and hungry. I relish every opportunity I'm afforded to study the craft of writing, to learn from mentors and to get myself out of context and out of my creative comfort zone - which, for me, is literally my bed, under the covers, in my tiny Texas apartment. When the opportunity to learn and be mentored and to get out of context is with Ann EFFING Hood IN FRANCE (OMG ANN HOOD! OMG FRANCE!), it's one I'm going to make every effort to seize by the proverbial balls if humanly possible. I want that propulsive creative force that comes hard and fast from new places and new people. I want all of the new words to describe all of the new everything. I am dying to ask Ann Hood ALL of the questions about how and what and whether and why; to listen with big open ears and bright heart and to savor every one of her answers like a last meal. 

I'm asking for help raising $3000 here because a wise friend once told me to only mortgage half my karma. And I think that just might be my favorite piece of advice I've ever received. I figure: I'll figure the rest out. Somehow.  

So, I'm asking you to be a patron of my art if you can. If you want to. If it won’t put you out. I promise to do nice things for you. And to make you proud-ish of me. As much as I ever do. And above all, I promise to write it all down. All of it. Every last bit of it.

 

Thanks, guys.

A Premier MoziMagazin Magyarország legnépszerűbb online filmes magazinja. Az egyedi megjelenés mindig is egy nyomtatott magazin stílusát utánozta, és éppen ezért adott a terv: jelenjünk meg kézhez kapható módon is. 

Mire van szükségünk?
  • Olvasókra, akik hajlandóak akár már három hónappal a megjelenés előtt pénzt áldozni októberi számunkra!
  • Hirdetőkre, akik akár a jelenlegi online magazinban, akár a nyomtatott változatban szeretnének reklámhelyet maguknak
  • Olyan irodákra, rendelőkre, szalonokra, ahol gyakran várnak az ügyfelek, és nem csak bulvárlapokat, hanem egy több mint száz oldalas magazint is szeretnének biztosítani számukra, mindig friss, egyedi tartalommal.

Miért vagyunk jók, jobbak?

  • A Premier MoziMagazin hosszabb, mint a jelenleg nyomtatásban megjelenő két filmes havi magazin együtt!
  • Persze a mennyiség nem mindig a minőséget jelenti, de jelen esetben azt is: a kasszasikerektől kezdve a legkisebb művészfilmekig, mindenről írunk. 
  • Bemutatjuk a legfrissebb magyar filmes tehetségeket is, akiknek megjelenést biztosítunk.

story:
Short Summary

Every Believer must fully understand how vitally important the understanding of faith is to our success in the Kingdom of God.  Faith is the “currency” of the Kingdom, but it is also the “current” of the Kingdom.  Faith makes everything work, it makes everything move,  it makes everything happen.  The lack of faith displeases God, but the proper application will allow us to literally bring countries to their knees. The revelation that miracles were never designed by God to be used for the believer, but by the believer has never been more of a critical teaching than in today’s time.  There is a move occurring in the Kingdom of God, an outpouring of His Holy Spirit which is perhaps the greatest move the world will know before the second coming.

 

In this book, Jassen R. Grant reveals from the scriptures key elements of faith that will literally change the course and destiny of every believer that accepts the truth of God’s word.  These laws when applied on a consistent basis will allow God to work His perfect work in our lives moving us into our destiny and bringing Him the glory due His name.  Learn “12 Critical Laws of Faith” that will change your life, starting today!!!

What We Need & What You Get

Current project estimations place necessary support at $3000 to complete the project and begin distribution.  I am hoping for partners to assist in bringing this project full circle, and in return those who can commit to at least $20 or more, a free book awaits you. We will take care of all postage to ensure you don't come out of pocket any more than the blessing you already are.

Initial project funds and first run profits from the books go 100% toward ministry and community projects to help thos in need.  We need your help in order to make this happen! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Everyone can do something, getting the word out and telling people about this project doesn't have to cost you anything.  Social media, family and friends can only help if they know the importance of this project.  Getting them the information will only cost you time, and you will only give time if you see this a being worth it, and I hope you will.  Indiegogo has share tools that will help get the word out to make this a success!!!

story:
January 7, 2013 Update

 

Many thanks to the more than 115 persons who have put me over my initial goal of $10,000.  These funds as described below will help me cover the expenses of researching and writing Hunger, Incorporated. I intend to use any additional funds raised to pay myself a stipend. The more I am able to raise the more I can focus on writing. With only a few days left, I’m hoping we can make it to $15,000! 

Who am I?

My name is Andy Fisher. I played a lead role in catalyzing and shepherding the good food movement since the mid 1990s, as co-founder and leader of the Community Food Security Coalition. I have worked tirelessly during this time to build connections between the public health, anti-hunger and local food movements.

What is the issue?

Big business stands in the way of eliminating hunger, of reducing income inequality, of reducing obesity, and of creating a sustainable and economically democratic agriculture. For example, up to 80% of employees in some Wal-Mart stores receive food stamps. Fast food and soda companies deliberately target communities of color for their obesity-creating products, despite the fact that African American, Latino and Native American populations often have higher rates of diseases caused by poor diets, such as diabetes. Big agri-businesses lobby hard to keep in place farm policy that benefits their bottom lines, but harms the environment or puts family farmers out of business.

What am I writing?

I am writing a book about how big corporations benefit from the way we deal with hunger in the US. Not only do they receive tens of billions of dollars from federal food programs, such as food stamps and WIC, but much of the anti-hunger community sees big business as a partner in ending hunger. This evolution of the anti-hunger movement from being at the epicenter of social justice concerns to more of a middle of the road corporate-friendly position has had positive short-term effects, but negative long-term impacts on eliminating hunger. These partnerships have also unintentionally made it more difficult to address obesity and reforming the nation’s detrimental farm policies.

Tentatively entitled Hunger Inc., the book will be published in 2014, most likely by MIT Press.

I have one chapter completed, and will be writing about a chapter per month from now until late summer or early fall 2013.

Funding and Budget

I have been funding this project out of my family’s pocket to-date. As I am currently unemployed, our pockets are none too deep these days. I’ll get very modest royalties once the book starts selling, but I won’t see that money until 2015. I anticipate that my research costs through next summer are about $10,000:

 

Cell Phone (pre-pay  $25/month x 10 months)                   $250

Supplies, such as toner cartridges, paper                           $250

Purchase of publications, subscriptions                              $250

Travel for interviews                                                    $7,000

(Northern California twice , Southern California, New York City  twice, Washington DC twice, Pittsburgh, Youngstown, OH, New England, Phoenix, and Chicago)

Research Assistant, 150 hours x $15/hour                          $2250

Any funds over and above the $10,000 I raise will go toward paying myself a small stipend. If I don’t reach the $10,000 goal, I will need to forego having a research assistant or try to raise the funds elsewhere.

Impact

My hopes and dreams – and my plans – are that this book and a subsequent organizing campaign will ignite a dialogue about the future of how we fight hunger in the US.

Conclusion

Those of you in food and farm world know that I am an excellent writer and strategic thinker. The timing is ripe for this book.

Please make a contribution of any size to this important cause today. Please spread the word about this campaign. Indiegogo share tools can help you do so.

Thanks so much for your support over the years and once again.. For those of you unable to donate funds, I want to hear from you as well. Post a comment or send me an e-mail (andyfisher.pdx@gmail.com)

story:
Campaign Overview

"In my first year post-college graduation, I worked as a medical scribe for a primary care physician. Becoming her shadow in the corner of her appointments, I was the silent observer, keeping her notes.

Unlike most human relationships, the patient-doctor relationship is marked by an innate sense of trust on the part of the patient. I watched this trust manifest daily from my corner, as people stripped down to their underwear without thinking twice and revealed the details of their personal lives with even less hesitation.

In day-to-day interactions, the question of “how are you” returns mostly generic responses. Under the care of a physician, however, people seemed to respond without the same reservation, opening up their lives for our examination.

We were told the plot lines of dreams, the sensation of first loves. Frustrated parents recounted arguments with rebellious teenagers; rebellious teenagers recounted arguments with frustrating parents. Young women described their weddings and new fathers their child’s day of birth. 

Welcomed into peoples’ vulnerabilities, however, the most consistent experience presented in some form was that of pain. We watched it plague old people, young people. We watched it plague parents, uncles, spouses.

We saw the happy, healthy elderly, women who looked 50 in their 90’s. But we also saw those whom in their 30’s had multiple comorbidities, and though it was unspoken, the doctor and I would exchange glances: we knew they would not survive the next few decades. 

Once, we discovered the bulge of a growing tumor beneath a woman’s skin. In the silence, we watched as her little daughter grasped her hand.  

I sat quietly in the corner and captured people's pain with my words, using phrases like "patient presents with Grief Reaction.” I turned their weeping into terms like "hypertension" for high blood pressure, and “CA” for cancer, recorded into the medical system like answers to logical questions." 

(-Excerpt from my introduction.  To read the rest, please consider supporting my campaign :))

----

This book is for you: for the scientist, entrepreneur, dreamer, or anyone interested in understanding how to use science to impact people's lives in a practical way. It's for people who have been impacted by diseases that have no cures and want to do something.

 ----

Story of My Book

Creating New Medicines: strategies for building the next biotech start-up is about a new model for helping future biotech innovators think strategically and successfully turn scientific concepts into patient-impacting new medicines. 

I wrote this book because I was deeply impacted by seeing the number of patients that ran out of medical options. People deserve and need more medicines and medical options, but this requires more people willing to take the risk of starting or building companies that will pursue this. In my experience, young scientists are often interested in applying their skills to help real people, but aren't sure how to start. This book is meant to show you how.

Experience is crucial in science. This is undeniable. But it's also not everything, and there are ways for young scientists to add value to new companies when they can combine having a teachable attitude with openness to straying off the traditional academic career path.

In the book, I will also cover case studies of famous scientific innovations with original interviews:

  • The stories of blockbuster drugs Tysabri and Remicade, from experienced entrepreneur and angel investor Dr. Martin Sanders
  • Creating medicines with a patient-centered view, with John Crowley's personal story (fun fact, his life story was turned into a Harrison Ford movie, called Extraordinary Measures)
  • The Gleevec Story - themes for translating basic science and an interview with the clinician who ran the pivotal clinical trials, Dr. Brian Druker 
  • Insights on the biotech industry and investing from Keith Crandell, Managing Director and Co-founder of ARCH Venture Partners
  • How to bootstrap a biotech start-up creatively with an interview with Jake Glanville, who was featured in Gimlet Media's Start-Up podcast 
 

What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in July, 2020
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this winter
When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • A personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

About the Author

Stephanie Wisner is an Independent Consultant for multiple biotech start-ups working on diseases such as Alzheimer’s, Parkinson’s, Macular Degeneration, and cancer. She holds a bachelor’s degree in Chemistry & Chemical Biology from Cornell University and is a current MBA student at University of Chicago, Booth School of Business.

Stephanie was driven to write this book after seeing the discrepancy between the lengthy timeline of academic research and the urgent present need for new medicines. She wondered if there was a faster way to speed up the process of creating new medicines, and this book is the result.

For more information, you can connect with Stephanie at swisner194@gmail.com or @sawisner on instagram or twitter.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #CreatingNewMedicines and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media. Thank you so much of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Stephanie Wisner

story:
Story of My Book

Importing STEM - This book is about the differences in the experiences of women working and studying in the fields of science, technology, engineering, and math (STEM) around the world. I also talk about how the United States can learn from the education systems and cultures in other countries in order to get more women to work in STEM.

My name is Leanna Chester and I am the author of Importing STEM. I wrote this book because I was shocked at some of the things women who work in STEM fields face and was curious if women in other countries around the world faced similar situations.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover what it is like to be a woman in STEM in today's world. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for equality in tech. And ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you create safe spaces for women and encourage the girls in your life to pursue whatever they want, even if everyone else tells them otherwise.

In this book, you'll learn about cultural differences and technology including:

  • how we instill societal expectations on children based on their gender
  • the issues that women in tech face
  • how we can change our views to allow women to feel safe and thrive in STEM

You will love this book if you are curious about how cultural differences affect us, want to learn more about various education systems, or wonder why STEM fields are male-dominated (at least in the United States).

Importing STEM is a non-fiction book that speaks to young girls who are interested in math and technology and people who are looking at gender differences in certain fields and why we need equality in these fields.

The Book - Importing STEM

The book is written in 3 Parts....

In Part 1, I talk about the history of women in STEM in the United States and other western countries. I also talk about the stereotypes that exist about women in STEM and why having more women in these fields is important.

In Part 2, readers will learn about the impact of cultural and societal expectations. I also challenge the beliefs and stereotypes mentioned in Part 1 and talk about the importance of role models and mentorship.

In Part 3, I talk about how the United States can get more women and girls to pursue careers in STEM based on what other countries are doing. I pull examples from other countries that have a very high rate of women working or studying in technology and other STEM fields and show that the US can learn quite a bit from the education systems of other countries.

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in July 2020.
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this summer

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book

And more...

About the Author

Leanna Chester is a computer science student at Boston University. She wrote this book because she noticed that there were such a small amount of women in her classes and in her meetings at work. Leanna began to wonder why this was, and especially if this was the case in other countries around the world. She hopes to show that women can succeed in STEM and that the female perspective in these fields is not only important but necessary.

For more information you can connect with Leanna at leanna.r.chester@gmail.com and instagram, twitter and linkedIn.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #ImportingSTEM and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.
Thank you so much of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Leanna Chester
