story:
100 Years in the Making, coming to life:

These stories have lived within memories for too long. These stories need a place to come to life, to be read and loved by children who will never know what it was like to live and play before technology existed. These books will be a make-believe passage way to ignite imagination, encourage dirt-loving and playing outside till the sun goes down–or until you cannot see your hand in front of your face.

What 100 Years in the Making needs to get started:

  • $7500-$8500 for professional illustrator fees (book #1)
  • $1200-$1500 for publication fees.

Turning Pages

People who love books do not need to be told of the importance of books, but rather they take interest in the quality of stories that fill those pages. Human experiences that span over 97 years hold treasures of insight that will inspire every person who turns each page of these books.

Building Character

Writing these stories based on my Grandmother's character is not only an expression of my love and admiration for her, but a desire to allow children to learn from her life-lessons and to help build their own character that is born from respect, fun, some good-hearted trouble making and good manners.
 

Help make 100 Years in the Making come to life.

Every single donation helps, please share my campaign to help me reach my goal.
story_txt:
100 Years in the Making, coming to life:
These stories have lived within memories for too long. These stories need a place to come to life, to be read and loved by children who will never know what it was like to live and play before technology existed. These books will be a make-believe passage way to ignite imagination, encourage dirt-loving and playing outside till the sun goes down–or until you cannot see your hand in front of your face.

What 100 Years in the Making needs to get started:

$7500-$8500 for professional illustrator fees (book #1)
$1200-$1500 for publication fees.


Turning Pages
People who love books do not need to be told of the importance of books, but rather they take interest in the quality of stories that fill those pages. Human experiences that span over 97 years hold treasures of insight that will inspire every person who turns each page of these books.

Building CharacterWriting these stories based on my Grandmother's character is not only an expression of my love and admiration for her, but a desire to allow children to learn from her life-lessons and to help build their own character that is born from respect, fun, some good-hearted trouble making and good manners. Help make 100 Years in the Making come to life.Every single donation helps, please share my campaign to help me reach my goal.

story:
The Story:

Brad Beatty, the father of Lillian Bay, has teamed up with author Ron Knight and Melissa Link of Brand Eleven Eleven to raise awareness for children born with Cystic Hygroma, along with inspiring families that need to make impossible choices when it comes to the medical needs of their child.
 
We are currently developing an adult version (Saving Lillian Bay) and childrens version (Miracles Happen) of Lillian Bay’s amazing story. It is our goal to get these books into hospitals and to families that need inspiration, hope, and faith.

What is Saving Lillian Bay About?

Millions of dollars, endless prayers, and several miracles were needed to save Lillian Bay’s life. She did not understand medical reports, or the odds of living. She has not been on this earth long enough to grasp the idea of fighting with all her strength. She does not comprehend strength, love, or faith, and yet, displays those gifts with each breath.
 
Lillian Bay defied all odds and is now a blessing to others.
 
Lillian's community, Boca Grande, believed in giving more than receiving, pulling together all their resources to send Lillian to the most skilled doctors in the world.

The Impact:

While this story is about a little girl and an amazing community, this story can inspire renewed hope for those that are struggling. We would love to be able to donate books to the children's hospitals for their patients and parents. Our goal is truly to let anyone that is losing hope know that MIRACLES HAPPEN.

What we need?

We are raising money to kick off this MIRACLES HAPPEN Campaign. Our goal is to purchase books and share Lillian’s story with others. The majority of funds raised will go to our intial inventory purchase, website development, marketing/PR, and fees to have the book become available through as many outlets as possible. The more money we raise the more books we can purchase and the more marketing we can do to let people know about Cystic Hygroma. 

Once we have published the books, profits will go towards raising awareness for Cystic Hygroma, funding for those that need a miracle, organizations that support those that need a miracle and a portion will go towards Lillian Bay's ongoing medical expenses.

What do you get?

Of course you receive all the perks associated with your level.  But the true value is that you get to be a part of an amazing journey to inspire the world to believe in miracles again. I think we could all use a little bit of faith and hope that MIRACLES can and do HAPPEN all around us.

When will the books come out?

Both books have already been written and are currenlty being edited. We have a great team that has been willing to work hard at no pay to make this project move forward. During the indiegogo campaign we will be sharing book covers and launching the first phase of the SavingLillianBay.com website. We are aiming for ebook completion in August and paperback copies of the books due out in September.

story:
THANKS FOR VISITING OUR CAMPAIGN PAGE!!  With JUST HOURS left before our campaign ends, I thought I would change up our page here with a more traditional Q&A format.  Here it goes!

WHAT'S THE PURPOSE OF THIS CAMPAIGN?  

We are trying to raise money to defray the costs my 86-year-old father incurred to redesign the cover of his book KEAGON OF THE REDBLADE.  These costs include paying the artist and change fees to the publisher.  We are also hoping to raise money to pay for books we can donate to local libraries, or readers who can't afford to buy a book themselves.

86?  THAT'S OLDDDD!  WHAT'S THIS OLD COOT LOOK LIKE?

You can see what Lee looks like as of August, 2013 in his video, but here's a pic from a few years ago as well.

I WORKED HARD FOR MY MONEY.  WHY SHOULD I GIVE YOU SOME OF MY  GREENBACKS?

We know you worked hard for your money!  We also understand you have many worthy choices on IndieGogo that are equally deserving of your financial backing.  Here are some reasons to support our campaign:

1.  You are backing an author who has devoted years of his life to writing and has completed five books, so he's a proven entity.  Much different than a novice who is hoping to write a book one day (and may never actually follow through).

2.  You are supporting a well-written book, that has thus far existed in obscurity, to reach the light of day and get discovered by book lovers worldwide.

3.  You are providing readers who can't afford to buy a book with a chance to own a copy of KEAGON OF THE REDBLADE, or find it at their local library for check out.

4.  Every level but one provide you with a FREE BOOK in one form or another!  In other words, you are truly getting back something of value in return for your hard earned bucks.

YOU'VE REACHED YOUR GOAL.  WHY ARE YOU GREEDY PIGS LOOKING FOR MORE!? 

Yep, it's true!  With the help of our friends, family, and some AWESOME IndieGogo members like YOU, we have reached our minimum goal.  Wooo hooooo!!!  But the key word there is minimum.  We set that number as the lowest amount we wanted to raise, knowing there were higher fees due if we did not meet our goal.  We have always hoped to surpass that number as $500 will not actually cover all of the expenses involved.

After the expenses of IndieGogo fees, shipping costs, and buying the books, we will probably be left with about half of the money raised.  The remainder will cover half of my dad's expenses.  Plus, we would like to give away some additional books, so any additional money will also allow us to share KEAGON with more readers.

HOW BAD WAS THE OLD COVER?  DID YOU REALLY NEED TO CHANGE IT?

It was bad.  But don't take my word.  Take a look yourself.

GOOD LORD!  THAT'S AWFUL!  BUT CAN THE NEW DESIGN BE THAT MUCH BETTER?

Uh, yeah.  A heck of a lot better. 

OKAY, SO GREAT JOB ON THE NEW COVER DESIGN, BUT FACT IS, I DON'T HAVE MUCH MONEY TO GIVE.

We have changed our perks recently and now even with a contribution for as little as $10, you can get an eBook version of KEAGON!

NO, I MEAN I HAVE NO MONEY TO GIVE.  NOT A SINGLE DIME...BUT I WOULD REALLY REALLY LOVE TO READ KEAGON OF THE REDBLADE.  HELP A BROTHER OUT?

Ohhh!  Got it.  Sure!  Like we said, our goal is to get KEAGON read by fantasy book lovers around the world.  If you just can't afford to contribute, message us and we will make sure to get you an eBook or PDF version of the book.  We have already given away five copies of the paperback thanks to generous donors and might have additional copies to giveaway depending on how much we end up with at the end of our campaign.

Bottom line, if you want to read KEAGON, we will do our best to make that happen!

TELL ME MORE ABOUT THE BOOK.

Here's an excerpt from KEAGON OF THE RED BLADE:

"Keagon regarded the fat stranger, who sat across the game rug like a pile of camel dung.  He called himself Akim and claimed to be a merchant, although Keagon suspected he had lied on both accounts. Almost all of Keagon’s possessions lay before the stranger. The pile of brass and copper coins was small, but the ruby was of good color and cut, his ring of gold with its odd setting had great value, his hat was of good quality beaver and his woolen traveling cloak brand new. All of these Akim now owned.

The man was cheating, but so subtly that Keagon couldn’t see how.

This is my last chance, he thought grimly. If I lose this time, we’ll be destitute, with only our clothing and my bronze bladed knife. That knife had gotten him the appellation “Red Blade” from his fellow soldiers. It was a present from his father. The aquamarine stone in the haft was reputed to glow in the presence of magic. Supposedly, the stronger the spell the brighter the glow. Keagon would part with his life before he surrendered that knife."

Ooooo!  Intrigue!  Mystery!  And the promise of great adventures to come.  Isn't that what we all want from a book?

Okay, so enough of that.  :>)  If you have other questions or comments, feel free to message us.  And thank you inadvance for your donation as well as reposting and spreading the word through other forms of social media.

READ BOOKS!

If you are reading this after our campaign has ended and are interested in buying a copy of Keagon, you can find us on Amazon.  Or if you want a free PDF or eBook copy, message me via the comments page!

story:
Bedtime Bible Stories - Explicit is a full-color book with satirical commentary that exposes the more sinister verses found in the Christian Bible. 

J.D. Shapiro, writer of the blockbuster hit Robin Hood: Men in Tights along with antitheist activist, Joey Kirkman, will be releasing a book titled Bedtime Bible Stories - Explicit. Bedtime Bible Stories will come with a “Parental Advisory” warning and is a satirical take on the Bible’s more sinister verses.

Along with actual scripture and anecdotal musings, there will be full-color illustrations that are designed to excite the reader and inspire them to read the bible from a different, darker perspective.

Your contribution will help fund our publishing, marketing, and initial setup costs.

What You Get

The unique perks offered on IndieGoGo will not be offered any where else. The copies you receive will be signed and will include printed and numbered sketches illustrated early in the making of the book. We will post on our website how many of each print were distributed and they will be very rare!

Education

This book is important. It will be graphic but with plenty of comic relief. Our intentions are to educate with humor.

If you can't contribute please share our project with like-minded friends and family.

story:
Story of My Book / Historia de mi libro

Creativity and Play at Work is a book about how to leverage the small cracks in the system to innovate right where you are. It provides inspiration, strategies and tools to begin your very own #playfulrevolution.

My name is Begoña Pino and I am the author of Creativity and Play at Work. I decided to write this book because I feel the world really needs more creativity right now in order to solve big problems in a volatile and uncertain context. Also, I think most people need to activate their creativity to deal with change, new situations and new emotions.

This book explores the intersections of creativity, play and the workplace, making the most of the opportunities that you have. It describes processes and tools to bring the best of people’s imagination out in the world, and it makes a strong case for inclusion and diversity as a core component of innovation. The main point is about finding the small cracks in the system where you can plant the seed of innovation, and then be patient enough to keep finding more cracks and planting some more. Over time, even a small seed can grow in concrete.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the value that play and humour can bring to the work space, and how neurodiversity can be a real asset in any innovation team. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for creativity in all its forms (theory, my own practice, facilitation in others). Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you grow in creative confidence first and activate it in teams and groups (including friends and family).

In this book, you'll learn about creative mindset, confidence and environments as well as the importance of patience, discipline, play, humour and risk taking. You'll hear stories such as:
  • One man who organised a 1 hour game session and saved the company $6.5 million
  • A team leader who took his team on a secret self-funded teambuilding weekend
  • A marketer who created a viral campaign with 10M views out of a joke
You will love this book if you have an itch for innovating, want to bring more playfulness to your life or need to get a team up to speed in a challenging project.

Creativity and Play at Work is a nonfiction book that speaks to team leaders in technology and any changemaker (human resources, executives) who want to look at creativity and play in a new way that elevates innovation, productivity, engagement and team happiness.


ESPAÑOL

Creatividad y Juego en el Trabajo es un libro sobre cómo aprovechar las pequeñas grietas del sistema para innovar justo donde estás. Proporciona inspiración, estrategias y herramientas para comenzar tu propia #revoluciónlúdica.

Me llamo Begoña Pino y soy la autora de Creatividad y Juego en el Trabajo. Decidí escribir este libro porque creo que el mundo realmente necesita más creatividad en estos momentos para resolver los grandes problemas en un contexto volátil e incierto. Además, creo que la mayoría de la gente necesita activar su creatividad para afrontar los cambios, las nuevas situaciones y las nuevas emociones.

Este libro explora las intersecciones de la creatividad, el juego y el lugar de trabajo, aprovechando al máximo las oportunidades que se tienen. Describe procesos y herramientas para sacar lo mejor de la imaginación de las personas en el mundo, y defiende firmemente la inclusión y la diversidad como componente central de la innovación. El punto principal es encontrar las pequeñas grietas en el sistema donde se puede plantar la semilla de la innovación, y luego ser lo suficientemente paciente para seguir encontrando más grietas y plantar algunas más. Con el tiempo, incluso una pequeña semilla puede crecer en hormigón.

Mi esperanza es que, al leer este libro, descubras el valor que el juego y el humor pueden aportar al espacio de trabajo, y cómo la neurodiversidad puede ser un activo real en cualquier equipo de innovación. En este libro, espero inspirarte el mismo tipo de pasión y entusiasmo que tengo por la creatividad en todas sus formas (teoría, mi propia práctica, facilitación grupal). En última instancia, quiero que veas este libro como una herramienta que te ayude a crecer en confianza creativa primero, y a activarla en equipos y grupos (incluyendo amigos y familiares) después.

En este libro, aprenderás sobre la mentalidad, la confianza y los entornos creativos, así como la importancia de la paciencia, la disciplina, el juego, el humor y la asunción de riesgos. Verás historias como las de:
 
  • Un hombre que organizó una sesión de juego de una hora y ahorró a la empresa 6,5 millones de dólares
  • Un jefe de equipo que llevó a su equipo a un fin de semana secreto y autofinanciado de formación de equipos.
  • Un vendedor que creó una campaña viral con 10M de visualizaciones a partir de una broma
Te encantará este libro si tienes ganas de innovar, si quieres incorporar más juego a tu vida o si necesitas poner al día a un equipo en un proyecto desafiante.

Creatividad y Juego en el Trabajo es un libro de no ficción que se dirige a los líderes de equipos de tecnología y a cualquier agente de cambio (recursos humanos, ejecutivos) que quieran ver la creatividad y el juego de una forma nueva que eleve la innovación, la productividad, el compromiso y la felicidad del equipo.

 

The Book - Creativity and Play at Work /

El libro - Creatividad y juego en el trabajo


The book is written in 4 parts.

Part 1 contains the introduction + chapters 1-4. This section introduces the urgency to activate global creativity, and the environment needed to do so, from the role of the team leader, to the culture and the relevance of having a diverse team.

Part 2 contains chapters 5-7. In this section general creative processes are introduced as well as the topic of activating team creativity.

Part 3 contains chapters 8-13. This part presents all the strategies that are necessary to successfully increase creativity, from patience and discipline, to risk taking, playfulness, humour and being strategic about opportunity finding.

Part 4 contains chapters 14-16. In this part you will find sample sessions, activities and templates to help you implement different tactics described earlier. It is your one stop shop, with contributions such as creative tools by Franc Ponti or Jose Ochoa, and a culture manifesto by Mario Armstrong to inspire your own.


ESPAÑOL

El libro está escrito en 4 partes.

Parte 1 - Contiene la introducción + los capítulos 1-4. Esta sección introduce la urgencia de activar la creatividad global, y el entorno necesario para ello, desde el papel del líder del equipo, hasta la cultura y la relevancia de tener un equipo diverso.

Parte 2 - Contiene los capítulos 5-7. En esta sección se introducen los procesos creativos generales, así como el tema de la activación de la creatividad del equipo.

Parte 3 - Contiene los capítulos 8-13. Esta parte presenta todas las estrategias necesarias para aumentar con éxito la creatividad, desde la paciencia y la disciplina hasta la asunción de riesgos, el juego, el humor y la estrategia para encontrar oportunidades.

Parte 4 - Contiene los capítulos 14-16. En esta parte encontrarás ejemplos de sesiones, actividades y plantillas que te ayudarán a poner en práctica las diferentes tácticas descritas anteriormente. Se trata de una ‘ventanilla única’, con aportaciones como las herramientas creativas de Franc Ponti o José Ochoa, y un manifiesto cultural de Mario Armstrong para inspirar el tuyo.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get / Lo que necesito y lo que obtendrás

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August, 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this summer.
When I pre-sell 120 paperback copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 240 paperback copies of my book, I will also publish a Spanish edition. When I pre-sell 300 paperback copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook in English and when I pre-sell 350 paperback copies of my book, I will publish an Spanish audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a pdf document including templates of some of the activities described in the book
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!


ESPAÑOL

Este libro se publicará con New Degree Press. He creado los niveles de pre-pedido para ayudar a cubrir los costes de la publicación de mi libro. El dinero recaudado se destinará a lo siguiente:
 
  • El editor con el que trabajaré para revisar y publicar mi manuscrito en agosto de 2021.
  • El diseño de la portada de mi libro. (¡Las maquetas que ves actualmente son provisionales!)
  • El diseño del interior de mi libro (copia física, formatos ebook).
  • La edición de mi libro para pulir la gramática y la ortografía antes de la publicación.
  • Los esfuerzos de lanzamiento y promoción de mi libro cuando lo publique este verano.
Cuando venda 120 ejemplares de mi libro en rústica, publicaré un libro en rústica y un libro electrónico. Cuando venda 240 ejemplares de mi libro en rústica, publicaré también una edición en español. Cuando venda por adelantado 300 ejemplares en rústica de mi libro, publicaré también un audiolibro en inglés y cuando venda por adelantado 350 ejemplares en rústica de mi libro, publicaré un audiolibro en español.

También estoy ofreciendo algunas recompensas exclusivas para las personas que pre-ordenen mi libro ahora:
 
  • Recibirás un documento pdf que incluye plantillas de algunas de las actividades descritas en el libro
  • Tu nombre aparecerá en la sección de agradecimientos de mi libro.
  • Recibirás un acceso anticipado a la introducción y a otros extractos de mi libro, con la oportunidad de revisarlos y darme una respuesta temprana.

Story of My Book / Historia de mi libro

Creativity and Play at Work is a book about how to leverage the small cracks in the system to innovate right where you are. It provides inspiration, strategies and tools to begin your very own #playfulrevolution.My name is Begoña Pino and I am the author of Creativity and Play at Work. I decided to write this book because I feel the world really needs more creativity right now in order to solve big problems in a volatile and uncertain context. Also, I think most people need to activate their creativity to deal with change, new situations and new emotions.This book explores the intersections of creativity, play and the workplace, making the most of the opportunities that you have. It describes processes and tools to bring the best of people’s imagination out in the world, and it makes a strong case for inclusion and diversity as a core component of innovation. The main point is about finding the small cracks in the system where you can plant the seed of innovation, and then be patient enough to keep finding more cracks and planting some more. Over time, even a small seed can grow in concrete.My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the value that play and humour can bring to the work space, and how neurodiversity can be a real asset in any innovation team. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for creativity in all its forms (theory, my own practice, facilitation in others). Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you grow in creative confidence first and activate it in teams and groups (including friends and family).In this book, you'll learn about creative mindset, confidence and environments as well as the importance of patience, discipline, play, humour and risk taking. You'll hear stories such as:
One man who organised a 1 hour game session and saved the company $6.5 million
A team leader who took his team on a secret self-funded teambuilding weekend
A marketer who created a viral campaign with 10M views out of a joke
 You will love this book if you have an itch for innovating, want to bring more playfulness to your life or need to get a team up to speed in a challenging project.Creativity and Play at Work is a nonfiction book that speaks to team leaders in technology and any changemaker (human resources, executives) who want to look at creativity and play in a new way that elevates innovation, productivity, engagement and team happiness.ESPAÑOLCreatividad y Juego en el Trabajo es un libro sobre cómo aprovechar las pequeñas grietas del sistema para innovar justo donde estás. Proporciona inspiración, estrategias y herramientas para comenzar tu propia #revoluciónlúdica.Me llamo Begoña Pino y soy la autora de Creatividad y Juego en el Trabajo. Decidí escribir este libro porque creo que el mundo realmente necesita más creatividad en estos momentos para resolver los grandes problemas en un contexto volátil e incierto. Además, creo que la mayoría de la gente necesita activar su creatividad para afrontar los cambios, las nuevas situaciones y las nuevas emociones.Este libro explora las intersecciones de la creatividad, el juego y el lugar de trabajo, aprovechando al máximo las oportunidades que se tienen. Describe procesos y herramientas para sacar lo mejor de la imaginación de las personas en el mundo, y defiende firmemente la inclusión y la diversidad como componente central de la innovación. El punto principal es encontrar las pequeñas grietas en el sistema donde se puede plantar la semilla de la innovación, y luego ser lo suficientemente paciente para seguir encontrando más grietas y plantar algunas más. Con el tiempo, incluso una pequeña semilla puede crecer en hormigón.Mi esperanza es que, al leer este libro, descubras el valor que el juego y el humor pueden aportar al espacio de trabajo, y cómo la neurodiversidad puede ser un activo real en cualquier equipo de innovación. En este libro, espero inspirarte el mismo tipo de pasión y entusiasmo que tengo por la creatividad en todas sus formas (teoría, mi propia práctica, facilitación grupal). En última instancia, quiero que veas este libro como una herramienta que te ayude a crecer en confianza creativa primero, y a activarla en equipos y grupos (incluyendo amigos y familiares) después.En este libro, aprenderás sobre la mentalidad, la confianza y los entornos creativos, así como la importancia de la paciencia, la disciplina, el juego, el humor y la asunción de riesgos. Verás historias como las de: 
Un hombre que organizó una sesión de juego de una hora y ahorró a la empresa 6,5 millones de dólares
Un jefe de equipo que llevó a su equipo a un fin de semana secreto y autofinanciado de formación de equipos.
Un vendedor que creó una campaña viral con 10M de visualizaciones a partir de una broma
 Te encantará este libro si tienes ganas de innovar, si quieres incorporar más juego a tu vida o si necesitas poner al día a un equipo en un proyecto desafiante.Creatividad y Juego en el Trabajo es un libro de no ficción que se dirige a los líderes de equipos de tecnología y a cualquier agente de cambio (recursos humanos, ejecutivos) que quieran ver la creatividad y el juego de una forma nueva que eleve la innovación, la productividad, el compromiso y la felicidad del equipo. The Book - Creativity and Play at Work /
El libro - Creatividad y juego en el trabajo
The book is written in 4 parts.Part 1 contains the introduction + chapters 1-4. This section introduces the urgency to activate global creativity, and the environment needed to do so, from the role of the team leader, to the culture and the relevance of having a diverse team.Part 2 contains chapters 5-7. In this section general creative processes are introduced as well as the topic of activating team creativity.Part 3 contains chapters 8-13. This part presents all the strategies that are necessary to successfully increase creativity, from patience and discipline, to risk taking, playfulness, humour and being strategic about opportunity finding.Part 4 contains chapters 14-16. In this part you will find sample sessions, activities and templates to help you implement different tactics described earlier. It is your one stop shop, with contributions such as creative tools by Franc Ponti or Jose Ochoa, and a culture manifesto by Mario Armstrong to inspire your own.ESPAÑOLEl libro está escrito en 4 partes.Parte 1 - Contiene la introducción + los capítulos 1-4. Esta sección introduce la urgencia de activar la creatividad global, y el entorno necesario para ello, desde el papel del líder del equipo, hasta la cultura y la relevancia de tener un equipo diverso.Parte 2 - Contiene los capítulos 5-7. En esta sección se introducen los procesos creativos generales, así como el tema de la activación de la creatividad del equipo.Parte 3 - Contiene los capítulos 8-13. Esta parte presenta todas las estrategias necesarias para aumentar con éxito la creatividad, desde la paciencia y la disciplina hasta la asunción de riesgos, el juego, el humor y la estrategia para encontrar oportunidades.Parte 4 - Contiene los capítulos 14-16. Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
And much more!

story:
My name is Lisa Liljegren and I am the author of Cast: The True Story of a Mom who Learned to Embrace the Unknown through Urban Fishing. I wrote this book to share the secret world of  urban fishing with you; a world I discovered quite by accident. In my book you'll meet a diverse and generous cast of characters who regularly meet along the banks of urban waters. Some show up to escape home responsibilities, a few angle to feed their families, all the folks I met were open to connection. While waiting for the fish to bite, we swapped stories about survival, love, family, and recipes. They treated me, a first-time fisherman, like one of them.

Everyone loves a good coming of age story and this is mine, only the second time around. As I learned to fish, I also learned to let go of my fears of inevitable family change. We were heading into the season of parental "lasts" the summer before our only child's senior year in high school. I didn't know it at the time, but I was searching for my "nexts" to soften the blow.

This experience brought me back to the city I love, yanked me out of my comfort zone, and introduced me to new friends and a new passion. In this book, you'll learn a little about fishing and a lot about being in the moment surrounded by the kindness and patience of strangers. I hope my stories make you smile and inspire you to think about your own “river bank.” There is nothing stopping you from going out there and creating your next.
 

Support Cast Early and Get Some PERKS

I'm pleased to work with a publisher out of Washington, D.C. named New Degree Press. If you pre-order today you can help me make important decisions leading up to my book launch in April 2020.  We're aiming to sell 200 advanced copies in the next month. New Degree Press created tiers for pre-orders that range from an EBook purchase to Superfan. All money raised will support the publishing expenses, including:

  • Professional editor through publisher
  • Cover and layout design (what you see now is only a mock-up)
  • Copy editor
  • Launch and promotion efforts

 

Will you pre-order my book?
I would be so grateful if you would help me pre-sell 200 books! If you choose to pre-order Cast, I can offer a couple perks:

  • Personal, autographed copies of Cast
  • Your name added to my acknowledgements page
  • Early access to the Cast manuscript
  • A vote in the final cover design (what you see here is only a mock-up!)
  • Feedback rights (although I always welcome feedback)
  • A private urban fishing outing

For more information, please contact Lisa Liljegren at teamliljegren@gmail.com.

Thank you for your support. Let's meet up at a Milwaukee riverbank - I'll bring the whiskey!

Hi, my name is Ed van Eeden, I'm a Dutch writer and journalist. I live in Utrecht, a town some 20 miles South of Amsterdam.

In 1999 I published my debut novel, The Bird Spider - De Vogelspin in Dutch. Since then I've published a whole load of other books: crime novels, non fiction, children's books, and some ghost writing, too.

But The Bird Spider was special. This novel has been a cult book ever since, and has also been translated into German: Die Vogelspinne.

Now I want to publish an English translation of The Bird Spider, to present this remarkable book to the English speaking readers. But, as you might know, a project like that is expensive: the translation, the editing, formatting and design of the book, and then publishing it as an e-book and a paperback on Amazon, Nook (from Barnes & Noble), Kobo, Sony, the Apple Store and  other internationally operating bookstores.


That's why I need your support. Help me to publish The Bird Spider in an English translation, and enjoy one or more of the benefits I offer you in return. You won't regret it! Please, help me out now!

story:
Paperback Writer is a Mac/Windows/Linux application that makes it easy for novelists to publish their ebooks as a valid ePub file.

As an aspiring author who has gone through the ebook publishing cycle, I was surprised by how difficult it is to create a good quality ebook. I ultimately had to dig into the code to create the quality I was seeking.

As I looked into why this was such a challenge, the answer became clear: Word processors like Microsoft Word or Apple's Pages (which are great) were never meant for ebook creation. They come with alot of baggage, such as handling hundreds of fonts, font sizes, tables, lists, columns, images and image placement... the feature list is huge. Any program that handles such a complex list of features must also have a very complex file format and structure to accomodate them. What's more, these programs are meant for the printed page. They deal with margins and page sizes and so forth - concepts that do not translate well to the electronic world.

Novels, by contrast, are simple. They deal with simple data: a table of contents, chapter titles, paragraphs. Sometimes you want to emphasize things with italics, bolds, or (much less likely for novels) underlines. That's about it.

Paperback Writer is a novel writing tool designed from the ground up for ebook publishing. It's a highly focused tool for a very specific purpose. It doesn't allow for any fancy formatting options. You only get what a novelist would typically require to write their story.

The result is a high-quality ebook that will work in your standard e-readers and can be submitted to self-publishing sites like Amazon or Lulu.

Funding Objectives

I'm asking for $4,000 to prove that this is a viable project. It's enough to at least prove there is a demand for this kind of software and to justify my time commitment. It will also help to support my family during development.

"I'm not a writer. Should I care?"

Yes! If you like books and discovering new authors, then Paperback Writer is a good project to support. Paperback Writer is aiming to eliminate one more barrier that stands between aspiring authors and their potential audiences.

We live in exciting times! It's no longer absolutely required that an author find a traditional publisher, and often self-publishing is the best way to get noticed. But there are still hurdles to be overcome. I can't eliminate all of them, but my goal is to remove technical knowledge from that list. As it stands now, if you're an aspiring author and you don't know how to code, it's likely that your ebooks are of a low quality or you're paying someone to make them look good. These services can easily go into the thousands of dollars. Paperback Writer will be sold for $25-$30, maybe even less.

By supporting Paperback Writer, you will be helping me to help writers publish their stories.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please be sure to send our campaign to anyone you know who's interested in literature and supporting writers! Links on Twitter, Facebook, or your own weblog go a long way to helping me reach my goal and making Paperback Writer a reality.
story_txt:
Paperback Writer is a Mac/Windows/Linux application that makes it easy for novelists to publish their ebooks as a valid ePub file.
As an aspiring author who has gone through the ebook publishing cycle, I was surprised by how difficult it is to create a good quality ebook. I ultimately had to dig into the code to create the quality I was seeking.
As I looked into why this was such a challenge, the answer became clear: Word processors like Microsoft Word or Apple's Pages (which are great) were never meant for ebook creation. They come with alot of baggage, such as handling hundreds of fonts, font sizes, tables, lists, columns, images and image placement... the feature list is huge. Any program that handles such a complex list of features must also have a very complex file format and structure to accomodate them. What's more, these programs are meant for the printed page. They deal with margins and page sizes and so forth - concepts that do not translate well to the electronic world.
Novels, by contrast, are simple. They deal with simple data: a table of contents, chapter titles, paragraphs. Sometimes you want to emphasize things with italics, bolds, or (much less likely for novels) underlines. That's about it.
Paperback Writer is a novel writing tool designed from the ground up for ebook publishing. It's a highly focused tool for a very specific purpose. It doesn't allow for any fancy formatting options. You only get what a novelist would typically require to write their story.
The result is a high-quality ebook that will work in your standard e-readers and can be submitted to self-publishing sites like Amazon or Lulu.

story:
Hi everybody,

i am Thorsten, a 30 year studied media-economist form aachen, a city near to cologne. Right now i am living in wonderful vienna, working as a copywriter at  wien nord. I am interested in all types of media but expecially in the people producing media: how do they think? The medias Agenda-Setting, for example. To what extend they are influenced by every day life, by newspapers, ads, tv, radio and the internet. Because i love people.  Especially i like backpaging by using the platform airbnb. And on my last airbnb-trip, in the citiy of bordeaux, this idea came to my mind:

Foreign living.The airbnbook.

Make the world better: Living in foreign places local at flats with soul, instead of anonymous Check-in at the hotel. That is "Foreign living. The airbnbook."

What tells us an apartment? All about the people. And about himself. I'll write it. In a book. In fanciful and grotesque short stories. On a double page. You want to see the apartment. But the images are hidden: Japanese paperback. You want see the homes, want to meet the people. You want to see the world. Do it. Nobody prevents you. Please take the book with you. And make the world better.

What We Need

  • 3000 € to go on a trip by interrail through europe and for example north-africa. I will visit only airbnb flats and to write and produce the whole book.
  • The more money is acquired, the longer is the journey. And the more bizarre and odd stories emerge.
  • The language: German.
  • If the book is a success, publishers are aware and the book will be translated.
  • But what i really need is Passion. Enthusiasm. Going global. Fancy stories. On cities. Countries. Read. And on people and their homes. And yes, money. I will inform my financiers with a first manuscript about the progress. For just a simple book is a fascinating read, a design and a product guide. And for all of us there is a feeling that there are still people who are so open to disclose their innermost open: the home. Only in this way we will create something that can make the world better: Living in foreign places at local flats with soul, instead of anonymous check-in at the hotel. That is "Foreign living. The airbnbook."

What Do you get – the pears

  • Whenever you're in Vienna, at my apartment is available for 1 free night. Every night in my flat is priced at €50 at airbnb.
  • The first 10 people can check my apartement for a whole weekend (friday till sunday) – for free.
  • Free copy.
  • Free admission to all lectures.
Missing the aim
 
If if don't reach the aim, every cent goes to
  • CARE Austria. CARE is one of the largest international relief and works for a world without poverty in which people can live in dignity: http://www.care.at/
If you are convinced, help me to create a fanastic book with authentic stories all over the world. And plaese use the indiegogo tools.
 
Looking forward to realize a project to make the world better:
Foreign living. The airbnbook.
 
With best regards from lovely vienna,
 
Thorsten Pütz
 
P.S:The idea only works when every heart is in to it: especially mine.

story:
Rompamos el Tabú

En Costa Rica como en muchos países, todos los usos de la marihuana son prohibidos. Pese a cientos de estudios que demuestran sus usos medicinales, los gobiernos siguen favoreciendo los intereses de las Farmacéuticas que desean seguir con la prohibición.

¿Porqué Legalizar la Marihuana Medicinal?


  • Por Salud: Son miles de pacientes los que se pueden ver beneficiados por las propiedades comprobadas de la marihuana medicinal.
  • Por Conciencia: Romper el tabú es necesario. En Estados Unidos y otros países el uso medicinal es ya algo Legal, deseamos caminar en esa dirección.
  • Por Paz: La Guerra contra las drogas ha comprobado su ineficiencia y su ineficacia, tratando como delincuentes a los usuarios recreativos, a los vendedores y a quienes por salud la usan. Legalizar la marihuana medicinal es el paso fundamental para crear un ambiente de mayor paz entorno al consumo medicinal de la marihuana.

¿Para que son los $6000?
Luchamos contra un status quo que se basa en mitos y mentiras. Donde consumir 10 pastillas al día hechas de químicos es normal pero donde la marihuana es satanizada.

En el 2015 nos planteamos la necesidad de recoger firmas para enviar un proyecto de ley por Iniciativa Popular a la Asamblea Legislativa de Costa Rica. Este es el primer paso para aprobar nuestro proyecto de ley.

Somos un grupo de jóvenes profesionales, que sacamos un poco de nuestro tiempo libre para avanzar la causa, pero necesitamos su ayuda, por más pequeña que sea para poder hacer de este sueño una realidad.

Si no puede donar, comparta la información para quienes pueden ayudarnos.

Gracias,

story:
Rise in Excellence, My name is DjaDja N Medjay (Jah-Jah En Mahjay) and I have been an anime, manga, sci-fi, paranormal and fantasy fan for over three decades. Finally, I decided to write after I was introduced to the works of Octavia Butler who is one of the mothers of Afro-Futurism: For details on Afro-Futurism.

Several years later I find myself my third book in, functioning as a one-man operation pushing to maintain the small-powered publishing company I have still yet to fully establish. I need a lot of help and support, especially financially, to be able to place my work to where I feel it can go. By April 15, 2015, I would love to have my third novel (which will actually be a series of Novellas) published and in the market. 

This campaign will help to finance the completion of this work (Rising Depth) in addition to re-editing previous work along with artwork (I did the covers of both my other novels)...and about several other needed things. 

Besides the need for success in my work to help support my family and colleagues within the same field, there is the importance of furthering the cause of Afro-Futurism, a budding field of literature, art and music from the cultural perspective of People of Color. My particular work is an amalgamation of African cultural information as well as my own personal view of science-fiction, metaphysics, daoism and afro-futurism in observance off the interaction between human beings and the Sun.

The goal of $3000 in raised funds will go to the following:

  • Editing/Copyrighting of my current project (Rising Depth) 
  • Cover Art for Rising Depth
  • Re-Editing of Prior Works
  • Kindle Formatting of all Works
  • Audio Formatting of all Books
  • Re-designing Cover Art for prior works
  • Promotional Material (Flyers, Bookmarks, T-shirts) 
  • Seed money for vending at the Harlem Book Fair of 2015 and Comic Con of 2015

And now a bit more on my current writing project:

Rising Depth will be the third Novel I have written as a Self-Published Author, which I lovingly refer to as an Afro-Futurism work (Click to learn more about Afro-Futurism)

To be honest, it has been a very challenging journey being the sole operator of my own publications. This is the first time that I am openly asking for outside help. I am very excited about this project because I am taking a different approach to my writing as Rising Depth will be a series of short Novellas offered at a reasonable price to help promote readership.  

Rising Depth Synopsis - Being a social worker at the world's leading sexual and reproductive health care provider can have its days, especially when you don't want to be there. What would happen if you discovered something that could get you killed? And what if that same thing can give you an answer for the strange things you have experienced in the past months?

Rising Depth will be a crucial element in linking the previous stories within my series as well as helping to widen the field of African-American Sci-Fi/Afro-Futuristic Authors. Ever since I was a child, I have been enthralled with the Sci-Fi genre and when I discovered that many of the principles mirror African or Nubian cultural ideologies and practices, I knew that I had to create those worlds.

Beyond being an interesting and intriguing piece of literary work, this project also represents the blossoming field of Afro-Futurism and Black Sci-Fi writers. A necessary field that will eventually serve the purpose to breathe new life into the already existing Sci-Fi genre as well as strengthening cultural identity for African-Americans and other descendants from Afrika abroad. Being that the world has rapidly become a global community, it is important for every culture to have an equal representation in it. 

I recognize that not everyone may have the monetary means to support this project however there are many other ways to participate:

1) Word of mouth - Spread the word on Twitter, Facebook and other social media networks. Use #rdresearch on Twitter and Instagram.

2) Like my Fanpage on Facebook and Tag/RePost my Posts --->>>https://www.facebook.com/AuthorDjaDjaNMedjay?fref=ts

3) If you read my earlier works then leave a review --->>> http://www.amazon.com/Jaja-N-Medjay/e/B007JVXDJ8/ref=ntt_athr_dp_pel_pop_1

4) Forward the project information to an individual you feel would be interested.

Thank you for your attention and time.

Rise in Excellence,

DjaDja N Medjay

story:
Hello!

My name is Tracy Brissette and I'm here today to ask you to help me get my first novel published!  Rhiannan's Quest has been two years in the making, and it's taken the help of my friends and family to get me this far.  I would love to include you in my adventure!

I am semi-self-publishing; I decided to go through Outskirts Press because they have a team assigned to me to walk me through every step.  In order for my book to have the look I want, and to get published in paperback, Kindle, Nook and e-book forms, I need about $1700.  The money is going to Outskirts to get my first production started, and to provide me with author's copies that I can share, and use for book signings.  

If I don't reach my goal by April the 4th, all contributions will be refunded and I will have to wait to do the publishing.  I really don't want that to happen!

I've already started the second book in what's going to be a trilogy...and once this ball gets rolling, there will be more to come!  I just need that first little nudge over the mountain!  Please contribute if you can, and if you just aren't able to right now...please get the word out to your friends and family who might be able to help!

Thanks SOOO much for your help! 

Below is an excerpt from Rhiannan's Quest:

At the edge of the clearing, standing very close to our burning home, was a large dark shape.  It seemed to feel my eyes on it, for it turned a bit toward me.  Backlit
by the flames, I could pick out only a dark, cloaked figure astride a large black horse. I felt frozen with fear. The horse reared up and spun suddenly to face me.  I could see then that the rider was wearing a heavy black helm, and that a dark light glowed from the eye-slit.  The horse leapt forward towards me and I backed up a step, and then two, and then I turned and ran.  I didn’t have a thought as to where I would
go, just that I had to get away.  I was running solely on reflex, powered by a mind-numbing fear. I fled through the heaviest growth, instinctively picking out the paths most difficult for a horse to follow.  Thorns tore at my clothes and
my skin, and twigs and leaves slapped at my face.  I don’t know how long I ran before I realized I could no longer hear the crashing of branches behind me that indicated my pursuer. 

I found myself in a part of the wood that was completely unfamiliar, the trees were shadowed and strange.  My clothes were torn and dirty, I was shivering with fear and my heart felt like it was pumping out of my chest. I was crying and exhausted.  I could think only to hide for the rest of the night, and to return in the morning to find my
mother.  I looked around me, noting the myriad of fireflies, and then a much brighter little light stopped suddenly right in front of my nose, and the tiniest of Phoenixes looked back at me.  It moved off into the night and came back to hover in front of me.  The soft, strong voice of Pared-Dje whispered to me, “Follow his light.”  The contact with the god left me both more fearful, and somehow comforted.  The little Phoenix started off again and I followed.  When I’d gone no more than a few steps in the direction it indicated, it suddenly flew straight up and disappeared.

I looked around me and, utterly exhausted, I found a small space under a rhododendron and crawled in.  I curled myself into a tight ball around my staff, whimpering a little.  I must have fallen asleep at some point, never hearing the branches closing to help hide me from any prying eyes. 

The forest couldn’t protect me from unknown enemies, and as it turned out, even the god couldn’t keep me from being dragged off.

story:
Hi, I'm Rohini Singh. I hail from the small island of Trinidad in the Caribbean. After ten years of translating my overactive imagination into words, I've finally put the finishing touches on my first book,The Time Manipulator's Son. It's a science fiction/fantasy novel for pre-teens to young adults. That's just another way of saying that anyone can enjoy it. 

I’m launching this campaign to help my fun-filled, imagination-stretching story and its message of self-acceptance, self-appreciation, and anti-bullying to get into the hands of children. If I reach my $2,500 goal, it will help get about 200 books into local schools and libraries (mostly here in Trinidad; see "The Details" for more). If I exceed it, I can reach even more kids, which is critical here in a country where literacy rates and bank account sizes fall far short of where they should be. 

The Impact

In our world today, too many children find themselves on the outside looking in. It’s quite heartbreaking to see children who don’t “fit in” being made to feel bad about themselves. They are often bullied, with terrible consequences. When I was a kid, I went through my own struggles with being different, but by developing my own style and learning to be comfortable in my own skin, I was able to turn my differences into a positive.

We all serve different purposes in life, and in so doing, we make the world a better place.  With your donation, we can help children and adults to understand this intuitively... to learn how to deal with the bullying that can come with being different… and, importantly, to have a great time along the way. We Trinidadians are all about having a great time along the way.

The Story

Though the message at the core of the The Time Manipulator's Son  (TTMS) is as described above, it is not delivered as a heavy-handed sermon. Character and story come first; what they mean for readers will emerge organically. 

The sky above Chyspah is a different color each day of the week, and its moons number more than two, but less than three. On the planet’s surface, all manner of strange species live together: biclopses, flykinds, steamhounds, blockheads, and yes, even earthlings. 

From an asteroid above Chyspah, a widow fearing for her child’s life takes drastic, unlawful measures to save him. Her actions trigger a series of strange occurrences and unexpected discoveries for three boys caught in the midst of the royal family’s fall from power. The boys must learn to embrace their differences (some of them supernatural), overcome their insecurities, and accept themselves for who they are. Too much is at stake not to: relationships, mysteries, and lives hang in the balance.

Read more about the world of TTMS on my blog: http://rohini-singh.com/blog



The Details

Every dollar raised in this campaign will be spent one of two ways:

  • Delivering one-of-a-kind perks to donors
  • Paying for copies of books to be donated to schools, libraries, and bookstores; most will go to Trinidad, though some will donated to U.S. locations

Exact figures depend on the exact mix of donation levels, but, in general:

  • If I reach my goal of $2,500, I can deliver about 200 books
  • If I reach my stretch goal of $3,750, I can deliver about 300 books
  • If I reach my super-stretch goal of $5,000, I can deliver about 400 books

Since I'm doing a flexible funding campaign, if I fall short of the $2,500 goal, I'll still be able to get a number of books into the hands of kids.

As for the perks themselves, take a look! They include, of course, copies of the book and several rare TTMS collector's items (some signed), recipes that reflect the mouth-watering Trinidadian dishes featured in the book, the chance to get your name in the book's Acknowledgments, bonus TTMS story material crafted just for you, and books and illustrations from children's author Ray Friesen. More about that fine fellow below ("The Illustrator").

The Challenge


As a first-time author from the small island of Trinidad—and in fact, my island's first female sci-fi novelist—it's tough to get my book noticed, both here and internationally.

This campaign is my answer to that challenge.

All of the money I raise that doesn't pay for donor perks will pay for copies of books that will go directly to schools and libraries. It's a simple equation: the more I raise, the more schoolchildren the book can reach.

The Illustrator

Children’s author and illustrator Ray Friesen has joined the campaign, and will be generously donating his own books to the cause. He will also be contributing some wonderful original illustrations. His color renderings of the species unique to Chyspah feature prominently in our perk packages. 

Check out Ray's other work at: http://www.donteatanybugs.net/

Advance Reviews of the Book

  • “Manages to be both kid-friendly and a thoughtful examination of cultural diversity... A coming of age story that just happens to feature flying skateboards, a fortune-telling alien, and some very delicious snacks.” Debra Pickett, novelist and former journalist
  • "A true modern fairy tale. Reminds me of The Wizard of Oz, but in space. With as much time travel as Doctor Who, and the cosmic intrigue of Guardians of the Galaxy."  Ray Friesen, cartoonist and children's author
  • "A delightfully original blend of sci-fi, fantasy, and Caribbean cultural flavor that reminds readers about the magic of childhood and the power of friendship." Rionne R. Boyke, Trinidad Ministry of Legal Affairs

Other Ways You Can Help

I know that some of you will want to help (and cash in on some fine perks in the process), but will find your wallets too thin to accommodate. But even if you cannot contribute financially, you can still help the cause:

  • Share this campaign with the people in your network... especially with parents or others who might embrace our anti-bullying cause. There are sharing tools aplenty built right into this Indiegogo page.
  • Put me in touch with educators, librarians, bookstore owners, or others who can get The Time Manipulator's Son onto public bookshelves.
  • Do you know any bloggers, journalists, or other media folk? Do you have your own platform? I'd accept any kind of feature with open arms, and do my best to support you back.

More About Me

My love of a good story—in particular, science fiction and fantasy—dates to my childhood, in which I read every action-packed book within reach. Before authoring The Time Manipulator’s Son, I dabbled in short fiction and penned a screenplay entitled The Space Rockettes. I’ve been employed in the Information Technology field for over ten years, and currently work for the government of Trinidad and Tobago.

My inspiration for The Time Manipulator’s Son came from real kids—specifically, from some of the students at a school where my sister was a teacher. I frequently attended events at the school, and after observing some of the younger children, the idea popped into my head: what if kids of different species came together for a common cause in an alternate world?

Singh. I hail from the small island of Trinidad in the Caribbean. After ten
years of translating my overactive imagination into words, I've finally put the

science fiction/fantasy novel for pre-teens to young adults. That's just
another way of saying that anyone can enjoy it.

it, I can reach even more kids, which is critical here in a country where
literacy rates and bank account sizes fall far short of where they should be. 


The Impact


In our world today, too many children find themselves on the outside looking in. It’s quite heartbreaking to see children who don’t “fit in” being made to feel bad about themselves. They are often bullied, with terrible consequences. When I was a kid, I went through my own struggles with being different, but by developing my own style and learning to be comfortable in my own skin, I was able to turn my differences into a positive.
We all serve different purposes in life, and in so doing, we make the world a better place.  With your donation, we can help children and adults to understand this intuitively... to learn how to deal with the bullying that can come with being different… and, importantly, to have a great time along the way. story:
Let the Magic in!

First, there was a story. It was about a boy and a girl, and about a curse they shared  in a land called Heskilia. I named this story Spring Charmers.

As I wrote down the story of Spring Charmers, I realized that it was compelling and  fun - and it worked. I know this because I saw it. First with my own children, and then with other children. I saw the sparkle in their eyes as they read or listened, I saw them being swept away by the story. When children want to play the characters of your story, you know it works.

But then there were those children who weren't so keen on reading. I knew they would enjoy my story, but perhaps starting a whole book was just too much for them. That was when I began delivering Spring Charmers one chapter a week, ending each chapter with a cliffhanger. And the feedback was amazing: children loved it! They just couldn't wait for the next chapter to be delivered - and that also applied to those who had originally thought that reading was not for them.

But there was a small problem - my story was written in Finnish.

Please don't misunderstand me - Finnish is a beautiful language. It is an old and rich language and it's the language I know the best. But I wanted my story to travel the world! So to begin with, I wanted to translate Spring Charmers into English.

And that's why I'm here.

My name is Katja Törmänen and I'm a writer and an illustrator from Finland. I wrote Spring Charmers without targeting my story to any particular age group. Instead I  thought whether I would like to read that story, and the end result is that both children and adults just love my story! I believe Spring Charmers is best suited for children between the ages 8 and 13, but of course every child is unique when it comes to reading. Spring Charmers is also well-suited to be read out loud, though it may be a bit too exciting as a bedtime story for the youngest...;)

There are 1-3 black-and-white illustrations in each chapter of Spring Charmers, and I've personally drawn every single illustration in the story. To be honest - if I would have had the money, I probably would have hired a professional illustrator to cooperate with me. But since I didn't, I was kind of enchanted about the idea of illustrating the book myself. After all, I was the only one who knew what all the characters, places and dragons should look like!


What I'm asking and what's in it for you?

So where does the money go?

The money raised with this campaign goes to the editing and printing costs of the book. I'm going to translate Spring Charmers into English myself, and then hire a professional for proofreading the text. My husband and I both  have studied English at the university, so practically you will get two translators for the price of one ;) 

And I have already invested a lot into this book: my time, obviously, for  writing and drawing (and redrawing). But also money: firstly to get a professional cover and layout for the original story written in Finnish, and then to set up the web site where the digital delivery takes place. I believe in Spring Charmers, I believe in this possibility to get children into reading, and therefore I'm ready to take the risk myself. However, your help will enable me to dedicate enough time for the translation process and then get the editing done.


And what's in it for you?


I've stored all these wonderful perks for you! If you choose the story, there are several options. You can select either

  • the digital delivery of one chapter a week covering a total of  26 consecutive weeks (details later*)
  • OR the whole story/onetime delivery as an e-book (pdf)
  • OR a hardcover book

*Digital one chapter a week delivery: Each week you will get a reminder email with a password and a link to the latest chapter opened for you. The delivery site is password-protected, and you can read all the chapters opened to you whenever you like and as many times as you like. The digital delivery of Spring Charmers is readable with any device that has an internet connection.

Language option: You can choose either the Finnish or the English version of the story, but please note that the English version will be available only after the whole translation process is done. The Finnish version of Spring Charmers is already available and it will be delivered right after the campaign. Also, there is a limited edition of 50 signed, first print hardcover books in Finnish that will be sent to the quickest campaign participants in time before Christmas - as long as you live in Europe :)Thus Spring Charmers makes a great Christmas present - one you will not find from any shop!

Disclaimer: We can't take responsibility of the Post deliveries and therefore the promise above is made according to what Finnish Post says about delivery times before Christmas.

Note! You can order Finnish hardcover books as long as the campaign is running. However, after the limited edition of 50 signed books, I can't promise they will get to you before Christmas.

And then there are all the other perks! An original illustration (not included in the book), made just for you and sent to you with a passepartout and a backing board. Or if you want a hand-knitted scarf (knitted by me) with an original dragon pattern, plus the signed hardcover book AND the e-book, here is your chance! There is also a chance to get a series of writing dates on Skype with me, where I shall give you some great writing tips. Or if you don't need them, some other tips :) Something quite unique!

Disclaimer. Finnish law prohibits direct donations in campaigns like this. The best contribution in addition to perks is to share and spread the word!

When will the translation be ready?

The translation process begins in January, and it will be ready in summer 2016. The English version of Spring Charmers (in the delivery format you have chosen) will then be delivered to you as soon as possible. And of course I'll keep you updated along the way.


Other ways you can help:

One can't always participate financially, but you can help HUGELY by sharing my message: If any of this rings a bell about someone you know who might be interested, please tell them. Send emails, share the address of the campaign, share the video, post on Facebook,Twitter, Instagram... There are wonderful Share tools on this page - make use of them! Everything helps!

This really is a big deal for me. I truly believe in Spring Charmers and its possibilities to enchant children as well as adults into the world of reading, to make magic happen. Therefore I thank you already. So KIITOS (which means 'Thank you' in Finnish) to all of you!! Thank you for making this possible!

PS. Spring Charmers is the 1st book in the series titled The Heirs of Heskilia. The second book (in Finnish) is available already, and the third one is on its way. Altogether the series will include 5 books , so in case you get enchanted by  the story, there is more to come...

story:
¿Qué?

Clave de Sol es una trepidante novela de género que te acercará a las cloacas de nuestra sociedad.

La investigación sobre un asesinato conduce a los policías asignados al caso hasta una red centro europea de trata de blancas. Al final la realidad se abrirá camino esquivando y sorteando los resultados clásicos de una investigación criminal.

Adrián e Irene, algo inexpertos, irán avanzado en la investigación mientras crece entre ellos una tensión privada que no consiguen resolver. En algún momento de la obra Adrián piensa:

“Como las heridas del cuerpo cicatrizan, las que son producto de la mente también lo hacen, quizás de una manera menos tangible, menos clara, pero cada minuto el olvido gana al remordimiento.

Es una batalla que se celebra en un campo yermo, y que deja secuelas en forma de arrugas en la cara, marcas en la piel, cicatrices en la autoestima…, y que genera, a la vez, humildad por arrobas.”

Y a pesar de todo, las historias siempre se acomodan a su propio final.

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una joven editorial con voluntad de cambio, de dar la alternativa a autores que no la encuentran en otro lugar, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el crowdfunding.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy te presentamos a Alfonso Mollón, o más bien se nos presenta él.

Nací en Madrid cuando todo era en blanco y negro por lo que me tocó dar color a mis sueños. Empecé a estudiar periodismo y música mientras intentaba saber más sobre mí mismo, algo que sólo conseguí, sin darme cuenta, cuando terminé de leer “La Isla del tesoro”. 

Desde entonces hasta hoy he sido mosquetero, aventurero, investigador privado…, y en más de una ocasión he salvado a la princesa del torreón en la que estaba prisionera, ¿cómo iba a dejar de leer?

Y de pronto un día empecé a escribir.

Alfonso Mollón es, sin duda, un valor a tener en cuenta.

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 800€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cuarenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Los fondos recaudados, se utilizarán para sacar adelante esta primera edición de Clave de Sol que saldría pocas semanas después a la venta.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Alfonso Mollón vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.
